author: {'steamid': '76561198032345325', 'num_games_owned': 2727, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1449572285}
review: I am a 45 -year -old father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father raising my son, who is now 14 years old. My son won this game from his uncle, so we installed him on his computer and he started playing. Until the end of the week he had 24 hours in this game. This was horrible for me, because it was hard to find ways to spend time with my son, because he is always with friends or just watching Youtube. So I decided to do a Steam account and get this game to see if I could play beside him. I bought the game, chose my skin and world and started playing, but I was stuck in what you should do. I asked my son for help and he organized a game for me to participate. I loved it, because it was the best time I spent with my son since my wife died. Since then, this game has approached me and my son again and now we spend time together away from home as well. This game reminded me that there is fun in everything, and I brought many happy memories to me and my son.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3221, 'num_reviews': 1486, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1667147163}
review:
Arma Tactics, dört üyeli özel kuvvetler ekibini kontrol ettiğiniz sıra tabanlı yakın çatışma bir strateji oyunudur. Oyun size belirli stratejiler, izlenecek yollar veya takip edilecek yollar sunmaz; hikaye odaklı görevler ve rastgeleleştirilmiş hedeflere sahip oluşturulmuş görevler üzerinden nasıl oynayacağınıza siz karar verirsiniz.

Oyun Hakkında:
Arma Tactics, dört üyeli özel kuvvetler ekibini kontrol ettiğiniz sıra tabanlı yakın çatışma bir strateji oyunudur. Oyunda size belirli stratejiler, izlenecek yollar veya takip edilecek yollar sunulmaz; hem hikaye odaklı görevler hem de rastgeleleştirilmiş hedeflere sahip görevlerde nasıl oynayacağınıza tamamen siz karar verirsiniz. Siz gizlilik mi tercih edersiniz yoksa daha doğrudan bir yaklaşım mı? Temel ve gelişmiş silahları kullanarak, birçok farklı rakip türüne karşı stratejik düşünceyi kullanmalısınız - düzensiz yerel milislerden zeki ve yetenekli paralı askerlere kadar.

Son derece tekrar oynanabilir görevler, başarılar, kilidini açılacak silahlar ve iki tek oyunculu kampanya ile Arma Tactics, sizi sürekli değişen yoğun eylemin olduğu birçok saat sunar.

"Farklı bir strateji oyunu tavsiye etmek istedim ve tüm eleştirilerde olumlu bir inceleme olmak istedim ama yapamam, bu, sıra tabanlı bir taktik strateji oyunu, ancak taktik oyununa güvenemeyeceğiniz, sadece şansa dayalı bir oyundur. Düşmanlar, üç duvarın arkasından sizi görecekler veya arkalarına baksalar bile sizin arkadan geldiğinizi görecekler. Ve bazen önlerinden koşsanız bile sizi görmeyecekler, ama bunun dışında grafikleri, animasyonları, sesleri, ekipmanları ve seviye sistemi beğendim, tüm oyun fikri kötü değil, ancak kapalı yerlerde bazen kötü bağlantılar nedeniyle bir eylemi kaçırabilirsiniz. Hikaye temelde 10 görev içeren iki operasyondan oluşur, operatörlerinizi seviyelendirmek için serbest görevler oynayabilirsiniz, atışınız, operatörünüzün bu belirli silah üzerindeki uzmanlığına ve mesafeye bağlı olarak etkilenir, ancak oyunun ana amacı olan 'taktik strateji' kısmı bozuk."

author: {'steamid': '76561198962733287', 'num_games_owned': 2695, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 1553, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1553, 'last_played': 1666795835}
review:
[h1]Spielbewertung von TrophyHunter[/h1]

Dieses Spiel habe ich bereits letztes Jahr gekauft, da das Spiel durch seine vorschau Bilder sehr interessant wirkte. Als ich dann die Bewertungen gesehen habe, konnte ich das ganze nicht glauben und machte mir dementsprechend ein eigenes Bild davon. Was soll ich sagen...

"Arma Tactics" ist ein taktisches Strategiespiel, das von "Bohemia Interactive" entwickelt wurde und auf Handy sowie PC verfügbar ist. Das Spiel bietet zwar eine Vielzahl von Missionen in verschiedenen Umgebungen, jedoch haben die Missionen oft ähnliche Ziele, was dazu führt, dass der Spieler oft die gleichen taktischen Entscheidungen treffen muss, was das Spiel sehr monoton macht. Die Steuerung des Spiels ist sehr simpel und die Menüs sind teils unübersichtlich, was das Spielerlebnis etwas beeinträchtigt. Was ist eigentlich mit der KI falsch? Eine Spezialeinheit trifft aus 2 Metern Distanz den Gegner nicht..., dass ist schon an der ein oder anderen Stelle sehr frustrierend. Desweiteren ist die Kameraperspektive des öfteren in Häuserkämpfen verbugt, wo durch man teilweise nichts sehen kann. Die Grafik des Spiels ist zwar für ein "Handy-Game" detailliert, aber die Umgebungen sind oft zu dunkel und unübersichtlich. Das Spiel bietet auch keine echte Story oder Charakterentwicklung, weshalb der Spieler keine richtige Verbindung zu den Charakteren aufbauen kann. Das Game hat aktuell 22 Errungenschaften, welche den Spieler teils sehr fordern können. Der Preis beträgt aktuell 6,99€ auf dem PC und 3,99€ auf dem Handy.

Ich persönlich finde, dass "Arma Tactics" jetzt kein ultra schlechtes Strategiespiel ist. Klar, das Spiel hat seine Macken und Probleme, aber habt ihr jemals ein Spiel erlebt, welches von Anfang an ohne Probleme, ohne Bugs oder anderen Störungen veröffentlicht wurde? Ich nicht... . Macht euch einfach ein eigenes Bild von dem Spiel. Ich werde es jedenfalls weiter empfehlen, zwar nicht mit der besten Sternebewertung, aber es wird auf jeden Fall positiv bewertet, weil spielen kann man es trotzdem.

👑 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43242924/]Weitere Spielbewertungen[/url] 👑

author: {'steamid': '76561198032589399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 269, 'playtime_forever': 672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 672, 'last_played': 1451560405}
review:
Arma Tactics - це тактична стратегічна гра з видом зверху, яка поєднує в собі елементи стратегії в реальному часі та ходової стратегії. Гра пропонує гравцю взяти на себе керування командою спецназу, яка виконує різноманітні місії у зоні воєнного конфлікту.

Один з головних плюсів гри - це візуальна складова, яка відображає детально військові об’єкти та гарно розроблені військові костюми. До цього додається можливість повного зуму на мапу, що дозволяє детально планувати хід операції та розміщувати своїх бійців в місцях, які надають перевагу у бойовій ситуації.

Проте, гра має свої недоліки. Найбільш серйозною є відсутність онлайн режиму, що знижує ігровий досвід та змушує гравця звертатися до одиночної гри з комп’ютерним супротивником. Додатково, гра може виявитися досить складною для тих, хто не має досвіду у тактичних іграх.

Загалом, Arma Tactics - цікава гра для тих, хто цінує візуальну складову та готовий присвятити час на оволодіння тактичними навичками. Проте, вона може не сподобатися тим, хто шукає більше динамічної гри.

author: {'steamid': '76561198884296335', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1656358259}
review:
[h1] This is one of the worst Arma games ever made [/h1]

The biggest issues with this game
[list]
    [*]The Levels are heavily unbalanced 
    [*]Enemies Can see you through walls
    [*]Cover doesn't protect you from bullets
    [*]Throwing grenades and other thrown objects aren't able to be used in random areas (commonly indoors a
    [*]There isn't much content anyways with only 4 weapons and a knife
    [*]Stealth is basically impossible as enemies can see you through walls
[/list]

some issues
- The graphics aren't great
- The GUI also isn't great but its okay
- The game is a buggy mess of code

comments:
this is what i would like to see from a game a few weeks into development not a "fully" finished game
this is the only game I've ever disliked to the point of writing a bad review
look for any other turn-based strategy game, it will probably be better in every way compared to this one

review:
Really enjoy this back on phone and tablet it's great to see it on here too.

However on here it seems a little ill balanced as you can be spotted by enemies who couldn't actually spot you and there better shots there are issues but I am not going to bitch about them as the games OK

Over all it's still fun but a bit frustrating at times & it's really good to play it on a bigger screen 

I would Get it on sale with a heavy discount and don't expect XCOM Or Gears Tactics style quality or standards

author: {'steamid': '76561198107212373', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1562390310}
review: I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034095420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1656291191}
review:
It's bad. Really bad. Imagine an x-com clone that is somehow worse than XCOM: UFO (in all terms except visuals). It has all the negative quirks of XCOM (old and modern) games, but with none of the quality-of-life features. 
You can't save (and therefore savescum).
If a single squadmate dies, you gotta restart.
You spend your XP points exclusively from the main menu...
So many weird decisions that make this one of the worst xcom clones out there.

review:
Se o jogo é bom ou não, pouca importa. Vai do gosto de cada um. Eu gostava do jogo. De fato, a sacanagem é que não roda mais. Os desenvolvedores o abandonaram e não é possível mais jogar. Entrei em contato com o suporte da Bohemia e foi essa a informação:

Hello,

I am sorry but this game is no longer supported.

Best regards,

Dominik
Bohemia Interactive

Ocorre que, paguei pelo jogo e eles decidem se o jogo vai rodar ou não. E como é que fica? Fica por isso mesmo? Brincadeira.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057385742', 'num_games_owned': 1638, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1438683418}
review: ARMA Tacics - пошаговая тактическая стратегия в прекрасной трехмерной графике. Игрок, контролируя четырех солдат выполняет задание на вражеской территории в декорациях ближнего востока. Тактический режим прост в освоении - перемещение солдат, занятие выгодных позиций и огонь на поражение. Но все не так просто - враги не глупы и легко дают отпор. Вот и приходится вовсю использовать специализацию каждого бойца - снайпера на крышу, пулеметчика на левый фланг, а штурмовика с обход, пусть забросает врагов гранатами. Плотная застройка района боевых действий не только прекрасная декорация, но и широкий спектр возможных тактик. Между миссиями проводится менеджмент группы и закупка нового снаряжения - тут игра ничего нового не открыла. Прекрасная тактическая мобильная стратегия - поиграйте в неё!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966274230', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1499145778}
review:
I honestly expected a lot more from Bohemia. They are so talented, yet they fell so hard in this title. My major issues with this title are similar to others who also wished they could have posted a more positive review, but couldn't do it, because it wouldn't do the game justice. 

- The environments are very bland. Texture work, shading, and even the locations themselves leave a lot to be desired. There's nothing particularly interesting or exciting here. 
- The story and campaign are quite generic and not enticing or engaging. 
- The bugs.... oh my the bugs. They are everywhere, someone call an exterminator. 
- And lastly, the interface feels like this made for a tablet and not a PC. It's ugly, clunky, and unintuitive. 

I was really hoping for a better experience here, since I love Bohemia's other titles. Unfortunately this one misses the mark, even when it's on sale.

review:
AI is nearly omniscient with 100% accuracy regardless of any cover i take.
All controls from character to camera feel un-intuitive and/or lacking.
Playing around in menus before i even started the training mission i was able reset a squad members base stats and nothing got refunded so hes stuck at 0 everything instead of his starting stats and no way to put them back. even a full reinstall didnt help.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168968716', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 270, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1673540288}
review:
Unityとかいうのが流行ってるらしいから、それを使ってモバイルゲームを作ろうぜ！うまくすればこの新しい市場で、低コストでたくさん金を稼げるかもしれない！…といったような甘い目論みで、比較的メジャーなメーカーが新人研修を兼ねて中途半端に出来の宜しくないゲームをリリースし、バッシングを受け、やっぱりUnityとかダメだな！モバイルゲーム市場はガチャでしか稼げないな！などと見当違いの捨て台詞を吐いて撤退するのがちょっとだけ流行った時期があった。このArma Tacticsもその例に漏れない。
今さら何かを期待して買ったわけじゃない。ただ昔モバイル版をちょっとだけプレイした記憶が曖昧になり、言うほど酷い出来だったかを確認したくなっただけだ。記憶にあったよりも大分酷かった。カバーリングは見た目だけで実際は機能しておらず、命中の可否やダメージはRNG依存で運ゲー要素が非常に強い。成長要素があるのでステータスで殴るバランスかと思いきや、スキルをMAXに上げ武器を最大限に改造してもユニットの使い勝手にほとんど変化はない。その他の部分も突っ込みどころは満載だが、まあ今更言葉を多くして語ることもないだろう。
グラフィックは、モバイルポートにしては良く出来ているほうだろう。Armaシリーズからアセットを引っ張ってきているようにも見えないので、おそらくは本作用に新しく制作したに違いない。イマドキのUnityゲーのほとんどがフリー素材とアセットストアの見本カタログみたいな有様であることを考えれば、そこは褒めていいと思う。たぶんな。
ともかくゲーム内容に関しては、あらゆる面においてBreach & Clearが本作よりも上手くやっている、という点に尽きる。畑違いのジャンルであるにしろ（ということにしておく）、インディー開発会社よりも遥かに出来の悪いものしか作れなかった点をBIはもっと深刻に考えるべきだ。OFP／Armaの魅力はAIのダイナミックな挙動にあり、戦術ゲームとしてお粗末な内容なのはArma本シリーズもそう大差ない、実際のところ。BI自身がそれを自覚していない（自社製品の特長を自分達で理解していない）のが悲しいところではある、だからこんなモノ作っちまうんだ。
ストーリーも、うーん、システム的に現代装備である必要性を感じないので、せめてCold War Crisisのミッションを戦術ストラテジーとして追体験できるような内容であれば、少しはシリーズファンの関心を引っ張れたかもしれない（モバイルゲーム市場向けという前提を無視する形になるが…）。いや、過去作に泥を塗るなと言われただけか。
Unityでゲームを制作するなら最低限これよりマシなものを作る必要がある、という、ある種の指標にはなるかもしれない。あるいは、Unityゲーのリバースエンジニアリングをしたい人向け。

author: {'steamid': '76561197988000877', 'num_games_owned': 1603, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1619094751}
review:
I've put this one off for way too long because I really wanted to like Arma Tactics. Conceptually, most of the design makes sense but ultimately they missed the mark.

To understand Arma Tactics it's important to realize that this was a mobile game build for short bursts of strategy. It doesn't have the depth of X-Com and it's limited to 10 story missions. But what it brought to the table was a "Random Mission" mode that gives you a quick burst of strategy to gain money and XP for your soldiers.  You can play the story missions while sitting home, but you can fit the random missions into 10 minute bursts while you're out. 

I loved this and, in fact, loved the demo on my phone back in 2013.

The tactics aren't overwhelming as you'd expect from an Arma game, but extremely light and arcade-y. You get 2 action points, the ability to aim/shoot one of a few weapons/items. If you don't fire, the AP is saved for overwatch.  As you complete missions you earn experience to train your soldiers into overpowered killing machines.

And this is what separates the demo I played from the full release. For some reason, the demo awarded about 10x the experience per mission. While definitely too high, it had a feeling of progress that kept me playing. The final release instead feels like they don't want to me to train. It's a darn grind.

This is made worse by the existence of countless bugs. Everything from freezing in the tutorial, to the UI getting stuck, to a mission where the secondary stealth objective is impossible because on of their updates broke the line-of-sight for the level! 

I've avoided writing this review and returned to this game multiple times now but I just can't tell you that its worth buying. There are too many good options these days to recommend this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043991646', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1601433577}

author: {'steamid': '76561198051376939', 'num_games_owned': 817, 'num_reviews': 480, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1612220689}
review:
После прохождения XCOM: Enemy Unknown (2012) хотелось нечто попроще, но с похожей механикой, и нашёл я значит в просторах своей библиотеки эту игру.

Классический американский военный сценарий в разных локациях, с выбешивающей музыкой и безпощадным рандомом. Порой у врагов получается появится из ниоткуда и угробить весь прогресс за один ход, даже если все предыдущие шаги были выполнены идеально. Для игры нужна максимальная аккуратность (в виде снайперских винтовок), и терпение; а вообще лучше пройдите XCOM: Enemy Unknown (2012), поскольку здесь контента всего на несколько часов.

reVote 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11095, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1612008451}
review:
This is a mobile ported turn based tactical game released with the ArmA branding, but this shouldn't be confused with the successful FPS milsim game.   It's more like a "tacticool" X-Com ripoff. 

As usual, mobile gaming makes gaming worse for everyone.   This is a really mediocre game, dumbed down and shoddily balanced, but let's face is, mobile peasants don't have high standards.  

I used to have a lot of respect for Bohemia Interactive, but after seeing this, all that goodwill is gone.  Bohemia deliberately set out to screw PC gamers here.  On Steam, this is $9 USD, on app stores, it's $5 USD.  Bohemia should know PC gamers are not here to be gouged, and can't be expected to pay a premium for a mobile game just because it's been lazily dumped on Steam.  Bohemia should know better, their lack of integrity and ethics here are extremely disappointing.

author: {'steamid': '76561199009138347', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 3580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 982, 'last_played': 1690005550}
review:
Итак, Арма - довольно популярный военный симулятор, известный своей хардкорностью, ведь умереть там можно было от чего угодно. Сам не играл, но решил помаленьку разгребать серию, что у меня накопилась в библиотеке. Начать решил со спиноффа - это проект, на котором решили срубить денег чисто из-за имени. По мне это весьма нудноватая тактическая игра в пошаговом режиме, где задача наших бойцов - окружить и грамотно нейтрализовать террористов. Для 2013 года не самая плохая графика, но по сравнению с нашими "Silent Storm" это просто шаг назад, причём огромный - 10 лет прошло ведь.

Нам предстоит ходить и стрелять, это два основных действия в пошаговом режиме. Скучно и быстро надоедает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125861813', 'num_games_owned': 681, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1438517577}
review: This game has a poorly designed user interface, confusing mechanics, a glitchy engine, unappealing art design, outdated graphics from 2005, and a dull campaign. It is yet another poorly ported game for tablets, best to be forgotten. If you are looking for a game of this type, Breach and Clear does it much better. This game is an insult to the Arma franchise and should be avoided.

author: {'steamid': '76561198409638907', 'num_games_owned': 1020, 'num_reviews': 287, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1606739084}
review:
J'ai acheté ce jeu parce que j'avais beaucoup aimé Arma III et tout ce que je peux vous dire est que c'est une succession de déceptions. Ce n'est plus un jeu, c'est un énorme regret. Je ne m'amuse pas, le jeu est lourd, le gameplay aussi intéressant qu'une vidéo de Konbini ou un article de madmoizelle.com, la bande-son aussi efficace qu'Hugo Clément quand il s'agit de se battre bref à éviter à tout prix.
Il mérite juste une vidéo de JdG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065964919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1603300041}
review:
El juego pinta bien, pero los controles son nefastos, tanto en teclado como con mando. Si fallas debes comenzar de nuevo toda la misión, sin perder a ningún soldado, cosa bastante complicada. La distancia de recorrido de los personajes es cortísima, cosa que hace que sea super lento avanzar si quieres ir con cuidado...

El estilo táctico que tiene me gusta, pero es insufrible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055091370', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 348, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 600, 'last_played': 1581448254}
review:
Mimo mnóstwa negatywnych recenzji ze strony innych graczy, trudno mi aż tak otwarcie krytykować grę, przy której spędziłem pełne dziesięć godzin, nie będąc absolutnie fanem tego typu gier.

Ustalmy jednak już na samym początku; jest to typowy tytuł rodem z koszy gier w hipermarketach. Niedopracowane animacje, niezrozumiałe strzały przez ściany, martwy przeciwnik który z jakiegoś powodu się porusza, lub kompletny freeze gry przy ruchu przeciwnika. Brzmi, jak nieporozumienie...?

No właśnie nie do końca. W całej tej crapowej otoczce, gra silnie nawiązuje do tradycji pokroju Jagged Alliance, oferując nam różne rozwiązania, które wywołują dość pozytywne emocje. Ustawienie przeciwników potrafi być losowe, a do wielu poziomów trzeba podejść na różne sposoby. Gra wywołuje regularny uśmiech poprzez nonsensowne zachowania lub błędy, ale nie zniechęca to do gry, która w jakiś dziwny sposób potrafi wciągnąć. Nieudane strzały frustrują tak samo, jak w grze AAA, graficznie też całość nie odstrasza aż tak bardzo.

Na granicy polecenia, ale chyba nie zaszkodzi dać szansy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985975371', 'num_games_owned': 2176, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1597087105}
review:
Just don't, I don't find any redeeming qualities of this one. While on mobile it sort of works, on PC it's got bad UI, unresponsive systems, sub-mediocre plotline. It just doesn't bring joy. 

I tried the first mission and had to give up. While the training went fairly well the UI is so very clunky. Getting characters to go where you click is an effort in itself and doing any actions has nearly zero feedback so part of the time you don't know if you clicked something properly or not. I tried using the gamepad, but that was a joke with some obscure scheme and having to guess what to press at each point.. I guess one could get accustomed to it, but I opted for the mouse which at least showed where I was trying to click.

I don't even want to spend too much of time writing this review. Spare your money for something else.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059771939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1593341404}
review:
Obtuve el producto mediante un humble bundle de arma, por lo que me salió este juego por un euro. En la primera media hora de juego lo empecé con ganas por la idea del juego ya que me atraía la estrategia, pero poco a poco esas ganas se convirtieron en ansias por desinstalar el juego. Por que? Por que básicamente después de terminar el entrenamiento te meten en una partida ya difícil de ganar con las habilidades que tengas. El sistema de progresión esta roto, y solo lo intentaron arreglar con un mapa que es solo de experiencia (no da créditos) por lo que el equipamiento será ya difícil de conseguir hasta que termines la primera misión. Con lo cual te invita a farmear luego con ese mapa, lo que me queda tedioso, Esto podría mejorarse añadiendo más niveles más sencillos, pero quizás lo volverá también más repetitivo.
Otra razón por la cual te invita mas a farmear es la primera y única misión real de sigilo la cual se encuentra rota ya que el 90% del tiempo 5 npcs enemigos encuentran mirándose entre ellos y necesitas 4 rifles francotirador con silenciador, no podras hacer nada si te hubieras pasado las dos misiones anteriores a la primera y sin pasar por las de farmeo lo cual ya me deja pensando que se diseño un poco para hacer relleno innecesario.
Al cabo de 5 horas me encontraba intentando hacerme ya todos los logros para no volver a tener razones para volver a instalármelo.
En resumen, se le veía intención, pero la ejecución ha sido pésima.
Puntuación: 4,5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004226735', 'num_games_owned': 636, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 3017, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3017, 'last_played': 1434786532}
review:
I might have a lot of hours registered but let me tell you: Arma Tactics is just simply a bad game. A bad flawed copy of much better tactical games such as Jagged Alliance or X-COM. I don't mind the simple graphics, but I do care about the tactical part of the game which is nearly inexistant here... 
The AI is quite dumb: most enemies rush you down and line up behind each other. The combat system is so unpolished that you just can't call this a turn based strategy or a tactics game. The interface is also a piece of useless junk, and it seems to be optimized for touchscreens and not for the mouse. If it was a free smartphone game I wouldn't mind, but Bohemia Interactive missed the mark with this game and shouldn't ask money for this sorry excuse of a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045712094', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1586519455}
review: Congrats, your game is so terrible i'm actually writing my first review ever on it. I don't know what I expected, I picked it up sooooo long ago, saw it in my library and thought, you know what I'll give it a try. Not only does the game look god awful, it somehow manages to play worse than it looks. The movement system is a deep fried bag of shit, any sort of movement next to an action is damn near impossible for reasons unknown to me. Why not just let the player double click the action within their movement range to perform it? Why can't I move INFRONT of the crate I open, why do I have to sidestep it, and then open it? Even the tutorial mission feels about as smooth as the operation of a fucking Zip 22. I don't know how much this costs anymore, nor do I care, this feels and plays like an early access game and the dev team should be ashamed of themselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8502, 'num_reviews': 3385, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1582050079}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Взяли какую-то треш игру с кривым интерфейсом, неудобным управлением и вообще просто отвратно выглядящую. Приписали к этой игре название "Arma" и решили варится на честном люде... Даже обучение не прошел, плюясь вышел из этого куска фекалий!

[h1]Оценка: 1/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании

review: за меня уже говорят рейтинги игры, присоединяюсь игра стремная во всех смыслах, купился на пошаговость и даже ето ее не спасает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048675042', 'num_games_owned': 1018, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1580310794}
review: Жуткая хрень, портированная с планшетов. Деревянная боёвка и управление, совершенно бешеная камера и НЕВОЗМОЖНОСТЬ пропустить анимации ходов противника (даже если их 20 штук). Непонятно как работает сохранение, если всё равно миссию каждый раз начинать заново. Худшая пошаговая тактика из всех, что я играл.

没有中文的arma策略游戏···如果是中文系统下载后可能会出现文字不显示bug！
需要选倒数第二个设置选择第一项语言，反正怎么选都没中文的···

回合策略游戏，有点类似战棋，但是没有固定的格子~~
但是我一个关卡都过不了！我为啥花钱买这破游戏...
哦哦可能是以前HB花100刀买的波西米亚大包里的...

review: Установил. Прошёл тренировку. Начал играть сюжетную миссию. Офигел с первой же миссии - тремя дефолтными бойцами пройти карту с дюжиной противников. Выяснил, что всё что ты использовал на провальном прохождении, исчезает, то есть если не можешь пройти с первой попытки, дальше будет только труднее - останешься с базовым набором. Удалил игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006878444', 'num_games_owned': 357, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1560431421}
review:
Por mas oportunidades que le doy al juego, es que es insalvable. Tiene mil errores, las habilidades sosisimas, el sistema de PA es malo, hay mil juegos parecidos que les podían haber copiado. El armamento y el equipo, mas poco variado imposible y sin diferencias muy marcadas entre las armas. La traducción es lamentable, muy buena la ametralladora M1014 (...). Que eso es un error de escritura no de traducción, y eso demuestra el poquísimo cariño con el que esta hecha este juego.

Me lo compre por la compañía, pero os lo juro, no merece ni 50 céntimos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125071982', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1449656283}
review:
Игра ну очень хороша! Мне зашла даже лучше чем XCOM2. Один только минус: всего три миссии, игра проходится за один вечер. По сути - это не игра а демо. И задумывалась она как демонстрация возможностей мобильной видеокарты NVidia Tegra III (планшеты). Очень жаль что игру не доделали.

Кстати - делали наши. Имхо, по качеству порвали всех. Жаль контент не довезли.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039477743', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1614205207}
review: The game is wonderfull, but it is unplayable in the current "patched"state. I do not know what they fixed, but I know what they broke - the operators are dead instead of incapacitated. Just says not enough AP. This can occur at any time - when you are shot at or even after you used stim-pack, it just dies anyway. This last "patch"is catastrophic. I love the game, I try to play it and find workarounds constantly. But no luck so far. Cannot recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998029976', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1545777932}
review:
Started "Boot Camp", the tutorial.
Followed green arrows that pointed inside a kill house (looks like a MOUT setting).
Nothing happened after like 10 turns wandering all over the area, so I went back outside.
Suddenly an AI ally appears inside where I stood 5 turns earlier, I get control of it.
AI enemies appear and I am informed they can't hurt my AI teammate right now.
Dispatched the enemies while already walking my other soldier over.
"Oh no, Marco--the other soldier--has been hit! You have to revive him!"

Okay, but he's still 2 turns away, but I'm sure that doesn't matter since this is the tutori--
Marco falls over and dies.

Mission failed.

Yeeaaah, I really feel like I should demand my money back for this.

And don't even dare compare this game to Jagged Alliance or XCOM (the old ones) or any other turn based action games out there. This isn't even functioning properly like a game and from what little I have seen of it it has about the 1% the complexity of a typical turn based action game; that is assuming the game does function properly at times.

Just... just stay away from this... this awful entity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150485715', 'num_games_owned': 894, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1528304067}

author: {'steamid': '76561198075713107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1545000390}
review:
Arma Tactics é um jogo da série arma que traz um estilo diferente de jogar arma, isso é a única coisa de interessante que se pode dizer desse game. Ao baixar esse jogo esperava ainda sim um jogo estratégico baseado em turnos, mas semelhante e com muitos recursos como se tem nos games de Guerra Sandbox Arma 2 e Arma 3, mas a verdadeira realidade é que o Arma Tactics é um jogo muito abaixo do padrão esperado para a plataforma PC , ainda mais vindo de um estúdio famoso pelos jogos de guerra que é a Bohemia Interactive.

Arma Tactics é originalmente um jogo feito para a plataforma Android , e para essa plataforma Arma Tactics se encaixa muito bem, mas trazê-lo para a plataforma PC sem nenhum melhoramento ou adição de recursos ,simplesmente cru do Android e ainda, torná-lo um jogo pago foi a cagada que a Bohemia fez.

De começo o jogo se mostra entediante, difícil de entender e com poucos recursos, o que não desperta o interesse do jogador para continuar. A movimentação dos personagens é muito básica e não corresponde à realidade tática de uma operação CQB , no qual deveria ter a opção de o personagem se movimentar no pronto 2 ou pronto 3 , em Arma Tactics o personagem só corre. As opções de engajamento tático, Breaching, tiro sincronizado, entradas e outros recursos táticos são inexistentes, tudo dependendo exclusivamente do orquestramento de ações do próprio jogador que consiste em clickar e arrastar o personagem para posição, dispondo de poucos recursos como colocar silenciador, uso de kit de primeiros socorros, estância defensiva e recarregar.

E mantém assim quase por todo a gameplay, não existe elementos de interação no cenário o que certamente aumentaria a experiência do jogo, a única coisa que muda são os cenários e os inimigos, mas de resto é um Ctrl+C e Ctrl+V ,os bugs existem , a história e a situação geral de cada missão são passadas nas entrelinhas e também não desperta muito interesse ao jogador, de modo que são quase descartáveis.

Arma Tactics é um jogo no mínimo bom para smartphones, mas quando entra para o mercado de jogos para PC, no qual existem vários títulos excelentes como SWAT , Breach and Clear,XCOM e até jogos antigos como a série Commandos, não se demonstra a altura quanto. Arma Tactics não deveria ter saído dos Smartphones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083480066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1456570447}
review:
A massive disappointment.
Could have been a great spin-off, as well as a wonderful Turn-Based-Tactics title. 
Any good potential gets overshadowed by either messy, or downright boring gameplay rather quickly (i.e. a completely unintuitive and borderline broken line of sight system, rendering a stealthy approach to certain situations utterly impossible). You might notice several design choices which suit games intended for mobile devices and indeed, Arma Tactics was initially published on mobile, lazely ported to PC shortly afterwards and it shows. Oh boy... it shows. 
Any redeeming qualities are purely in the eye of the beholder and way too few either way.
Eventually Arma Tactics can't be recommended to fans of the Armed Assault franchise in general, as well as Turn-Based-Tactics die hards.

review: Arma Tactics es un juego de estrategia de combate por turnos, donde el jugador toma el control de un equipo de Fuerzas Especiales de cuatro miembros. Donde tendrás que idear estrategias, elegir de qué manera enfocar los objetivos, ya sea de manera sigilosa o bien alborotador a los tiros. La idea del juego esta buena, pero lamentablemente, esta versión no lo es. Es un juego lleno de bugs, con una IA realmente lamentable, totalmente aburrido que ni lo consideraría un juego casual, lamentablemente no lo recomiendo por más que valga poco y nada.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033824219', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1539752786}
review:
One of the worst games I've ever played. 
Impossibly hard: if one person loses their health (something that should incapacitate and require you to heal them within a certain number of turns which happens in the tutorial) then you lose the mission. No ability to heal them, no continuing on without them. You lose and have to restart. 
Experience is slow: you don't get very much experience/ cash (which you buy things with) from what I can tell, which isn't a big deal, except that health packs, grenades, and several other items are CONSUMED with each use! 
Moving fire: enemy units will sometimes shoot at you if they catch one of your guys crossing their lining of sight, again, not a big deal. Except, that the same is NOT true of your troops! The bad guys have no problem running up point blank (or even behind) your guys and giving them an up close and personal shot to the head (though, this usually isn't an instakill). 
Ineffectual cover: cover makes practically no difference. Even when in cover and using the special cover/shield task (this takes movement points and it is supposed to reduce the enemy's chance of getting a hit) you will still get shot most of the time. Maybe it just reduces damage.
Line of sight: this one is a pretty big deal. If you sneak up on a room of enemies when they are alerted, perhaps taking cover on the outside of the door, you will be spotted and subsequently shot next turn.
Last comment: This is the first game of the genre that I have played and I actually like the format and the strategy, but this game is tremendously awful. DON'T buy it for any price, not even for free!

P.S.
Alerted just means after one of your guys have been spotted, which could have been anywhere else on the map and it doesn't seem to go away.

review:
Let me sum up this game for those who are figuring out if you should buy it...

go through tutorial rather easily.  

Start mission one.  run for about 3 turns, find and enemy and kill a few.  Then immediately get gang fked by a bunch more enemies that converge on your position and kill one guy, thus ending the mission.  Played first mission quite a few times and each time this is what happened.  Honestly, they need a better difficulty level.  Its like you haver two choices, get fked or get fked royally.  Just wasnt fun and theres no way around this.  you have guys on rooftops killing you and also guys running up to your spot 2 or 3 at a time.  Just a shit game.  Avoid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194587166', 'num_games_owned': 727, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1534691687}
review:
[h1] Rating: 5 out of 10 [/h1]
As a turn-based tactics game fan, this game is average among all the TBT games. The game is short: 15 hrs in, and I got all the achievements (although the achievement won’t count towards total achievement status)

[h1]The Good: [/h1]
There are a few weapons and equipment to choose from: Carbines (all-around weapon), sniper (long range), LMG (uhh, I do not see specific use of this, as you cannot suppress enemy), shotgun (short range 1 shot 1 kill guaranteed), flash-bang (lower accuracy and add range penalty), med-kit (God items-you can heal any type of damage with this), frag grenade, smoke grenade (lower the chance of being hit), morphine (payday 2 equivalent of ‘get the fuck up’), claymore (boom), and remote claymore (good for ambush, it brings a smile to my face when AI gather together and 1 claymore takes care of all of them).

Some weapons have a silencer. If you want to go stealth, it is totally doable (except for a mission where the silencer is disabled)

Each of your operatives is pre-assigned some skills to fill a role in the team and can equip up to 5 different kinds of weapons (1) and equipment (4). You can lv up your operatives to be a specialist on certain things or have all-around skills. 

The graphics are not bad, but also no highlight 

The soundtrack is fitting. 

[h1]The Bad: [/h1]
Oh man, where should I start… This game has many that prevent me from recommending it.

[u] Game-breaking bug: [/u]
game stuck on the enemy turn even if they all finished moving, the only way to continue to play is to force close the game through task manager and restart

[u] The cover system: [/u]
Does not seem to work. AI can still shoot you no matter what. Hit chance seems to be determined purely by weapon type and distance.

[u] AI: [/u]
[olist]
    [*]Rush to you in a straight line without any tactic. This allows you to set up a remote claymore and take care of 5+ enemies in one click. 
    [*]AI is also shortsighted and astigmatic. You can see them, but they cannot see you. This allows some ridiculous action.
    [*] In stealth, when you one patrol, another patrol near him won’t notice (unless they are facing each other). So I guess seeing friends being shot or seeing a dead body means nothing.
[/olist]

[u] Gun firing animation: [/u]
[olist]
    [*] Sometimes when your operative fires at the sky, the enemy in front of him gets shot. Magic right! Magneto, or how else can you explain the magically curved bullet!
    [*] You can clearly shoot through walls
[/olist]

[u] Character model: [/u]
Only one model is used. Then how do you distinguish them in your team menu? Add a mustache!

[u] Voice acting [/u] 
voice acting does not seem to fit the situation. One particularly is awkward in all his lines

[u] Using Arma’s name but no mil-sim: [/u]
Fire a sniper rifle with a silencer in a room to kill one enemy. The other enemy in the same room won’t hear anything.

[h1]Overall, I won’t recommend this game. The cons overwhelm the pros. If you really run out of TBS, you can give it a try. [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198038633446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1530809253}
review:
Really quite frustrating and tedious to play compared to other TBS and RTS games

The entire cover system seems pointless when enemies can shoot you whether you're behind cover or not (just seems to be pure chance/distance when it comes to being shot by enemies).

If one of your squad dies you will lose the mission and have to start it again, I found it very difficult to even get past the first section of the first mission after the tutorial on the default difficulty.

Movement is very slow and tedious in terms of where you are allowed to move as well as where you are allowed to take cover, some place you can take cover and some you can't, even if it would seem like it'd be an obvious place to take cover.

The selection of inventory items is a bit of an obscure system of primarily using the left mouse button, I kept accidentally opening the action menu when trying to move characters.

Throwing grenades where you want them to go is not easy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107885789', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1528820082}
review:
Despite all the negative reviews, I thought to myself: "It's XCOM in a modern warfare setting. It can't be THAT bad.". Sadly, I was wrong. Game is barely playable, not just because of some bugs, but also because the mechanics are clunky and inconsistent. 

Regardless, I just wasn't having much fun in the very brief time I spent playing it, and that's coming from someone who is often able to find at least some enjoyment in even the worst games. Thankfully I got it as part of the Arma Humble Bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031621784', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1528031945}
review:
Rating: 2 out of 10

I like the arma franchise and turnbased tactics. 
Jagged Alliance and Xcom are some of my favourite games.
This game is a casual mobile port game, a dumbed down XCOM, 
copying the formula of the new Xcom reboot and it's failures while omitting it's strength.

Pros:
+ serviceable graphics

Cons (endless):
- casual gameplay without much tactical options
- unresponsive mobile port userinterface
- dumb a.i.
- boring story and atmosphere
- bad voiceacting
- no arma mil-sim-gameplay
...

author: {'steamid': '76561198102765450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1589747016}
review: I got this as part of a really cheap bundle and I find it rather addictive but hard. You need to enjoy strategy games becuase there is no other way around it and it's alot harder as if one person dies then you must restart. However, I do find it extremly fun but I think it is a bit expensive for what it is. But in saying that I only got it for 75p so who am I to judge on price?

author: {'steamid': '76561198116517331', 'num_games_owned': 3235, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 1205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1205, 'last_played': 1524777821}
review:
This game is playable but it has significant problems:

-experience gain is too low
-money gain is too low, and you need to buy all of your gear other than the basic assault rifle
-a soldier that loses all health can either die instantly, ending the mission, or start bleeding out or is able to be revived.  This can cause the tutorial to end in failure.
-the missions should've been shorter and more numerous rather than long and few
-damage dealt is highly variable and unpredictable
-the game hangs or soft locks on occasion

author: {'steamid': '76561198066645868', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1508087471}
review:
arma tactics è beh, arma 2 con più problemi più bug più glitch ma è uno strategico, il che rende le cose meno divertenti e più frustranti, ne volete un'esempio ? allora, mentre faccio avanzare i personaggi e si mettono dietro un riparo vengono colpiti dai nemici perchè troppo "pigri" da accucciarsi invece di stare alzato e esporre la testa al nemico.
ah i nemici, mira infallibile a centinaia e turni infiniti, manco fosse xcom cazzo.
devo essere sincero a me personalmente il titolo non ha fatto schifo in tutti i sensi però è davvero uno strategico penoso quasi indegno di essere definito tale, gli sviluppatori con qualche accortezza e qualche riguardo in più per le meccaniche e i bug avrebbero potuto fare di arma tactics il titolo di strategia di eccellenza della bohemia, invece hanno preferito fare come fare come dean hall e dayz standalone, ovvero abbandonarlo al suo destino funesto ovvero quello di esser gettato nel dimenticatoio, e fa arrabbiare dico perchè come tutti i giochi che si trovano nel dimenticatoio aveva e ha ancora oggi un sacco di potenziale ma viene dimenticato a causa di difetti tecnici causati dalla pigrizia degli sviluppatori.
purtroppo è brutto dirlo ma, se avete soldi da spendere andate su altri giochi, oppure aspettate i saldi estivi o invernali perchè il titolo non vale a prezzo pieno, al massimo due euro in queste condizioni, e dimenticatevi degli update oramai è troppo vecchio per questo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069844409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1520176578}
review: Hra je chaotická, především svým ovládáním. Několikrát se mi stalo, když jsem chtěl označit vojáka, tak na jeho místo přiběhl můj aktivní voják. Je to určitě v praxi a ve větším počtu hraní, ale tohle mi opravdu vadilo. Co se týče vylepšování týmu tak musím opustit hru, abych mohl vylepšit vojáky? Opravdu? Než jsem na to přišel tak jsem si říkal k čemu mi jsou tedy zkušenostní body, když nikde nevidím posun. Možná, kdyby se to dalo vylepšovat před každou akcí, bylo by to lepší. Poslední věc - nákupy. Tak já si vytvořím dobrou zbraň, ale nikde ji nevidím. Mohlo se to lépe zpracovat. Úroveň obtížnosti i na normál je dost vysoká. Spíše bych to viděl na postupné ztěžování. Standardně vycvičené a mizerně vyzbrojené vojáky také nepošlete na nebezpečnou misi. Ale to je jen můj takový pohled.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115048559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 987, 'last_played': 1514405700}
review:
En primer lugar para poder contextualizar adecuadamente mi análisis personal sobre Arma Tactics decir que he jugado desde mediados de la década de los 90 a un gran número de juegos de tipo estrategia por turnos y estrategia en tiempo real, me enganché al género con los juegos de la franquicia XCOM … desde sus comienzos en los años 90. Franquicia que sigo con extraordinario interés desde sus comienzos con Microsprose hasta la actualidad.

Inicialmente he tenido muchas reticencias sobre Arma Tactics debido a:

- Es el primer juego de esta serie basado en estrategia por turnos.
- Comentarios de la comunidad mayormente negativos.

Todo esto me ha llevado a no instalarlo hasta estas navidades. Las promociones de Steam, a un precio inferior a 1,5€ y mi predilección por la estrategia por turnos tipo XCOM me han animado a adquirirlo.

Tras la instalación comencé a jugarlo con gran interés, y tras las horas necesarias (no muchas, en torno a 20) invertidas en jugar todas las campañas que incluye, los mapas individuales y todos los logros Steam, expongo a la Comunidad mis apreciaciones sobre el juego con el ánimo de que puedan aportar algo.

- Como en la mayoría de este tipo de juegos hay dos grandes partes: Gestión de bases y misiones.

- Gestión de Bases: Realmente solo hay una única “base”, en este caso, campamento, y la gestión de esta es casi inexistente. Se limita a: Seleccionar misión a realizar, gestión de soldados (Equipo) y equipamiento del campamento (armería).

- Gestión de Base: Seleccionar misión. Hay 2 campañas de 5 misiones cada una y la posibilidad de seleccionar una misión parametrizándola: Tipo (Defensa, Huida, búsqueda de un terrorista) y Escenario (uno de los 10 utilizados en las misiones de campaña). Resumiendo el desarrollo del juego es bastante elemental (dos minicampañas independientes la una de la otra de 5 misiones cada una).

- Gestión de Base: Soldados (Equipo). Nuevamente …. Tremendamente elemental. La Personalización de personajes es Inexistente (No se puede cambiar el nombre, el aspecto … ni siquiera el número de miembros o su tipo). Los puntos de experiencia se pueden acumular en experiencia del manejo de armas, combate sin armas o en movimiento). Nada más …

- Gestión de Base: Tipos de arma y compra (Armería). También limitadísimo, 4 armas (fusil, escopeta, ametralladora ligera y rifle de francotirador) más algunos explosivos y botiquín. Los créditos para su compra se obtienen al cumplimentar misiones.

- Gestión de Base: Investigación, fabricación, información, despliegues y formación de equipos: NI SIQUIERA EXISTEN LOS CONCEPTOS EN EL JUEGO.

- Misiones: El inicio de las misiones vuelve a mostrar lo limitadísimo de este juego al tener que equipar los soldados (5 ranuras fijas, 1 para el arma y el resto para explosivos, botiquines, etc. Una vez iniciada la misión el juego refleja, el a mi entender único aspecto “positivo del juego” … Respeta la dinámica habitual de la estrategia por turnos con los turnos de acción y la selección de tipo de disparo. La variedad y la IA de los enemigos, es casi inexistente … Casi todos iguales y con movimientos más que predecibles.

- Traducción al Castellano. Realizada en torno a un 75% (el 25% restante está en inglés). Siendo lo más positivo posible sin faltar a la realidad mi opinión es que es … MUY mejorable (llamar “Ametralladora” a una escopeta de toda la vida … creo que esto lo puede resumir este aspecto del juego, por no extenderme).

- Ambientación y Contextualización: Casi inexistente. Se reduce a unas cuantas líneas e texto.

Conclusión: Lamentablemente tengo que hacer una valoración negativa (en torno a un 2 sobre 10), de hecho es la primera que hago en Steam … Tiene todo el aspecto de ser un juego hecho con prisas aprovechando el buen motor gráfico de ARMA y su reputación … sin conocer el género de la estrategia por turnos y lo que los jugadores del género demandamos en 2017 sobre ellos. Resumiendo, mi impresión es que se ha querido “hacer caja” sacando de forma apresurada un juego de estrategia por turnos basado en ARMA.

Quitando los gráficos  … No es ni siquiera comparable a juegos como XCOM. De hecho, está, muy, muy, pero que muy por debajo del primer XCOM de Microprose … ¡De los años 90!

Espero que estos comentarios aporten visibilidad a los amantes de la estrategia por turnos y que se hayan planteado adquirir este juego.

Saludos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095543743', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1491446017}
review:
Arma Tactics is a game that I personally expected to be better simply because of it being an Arma game. I got all the Arma games together in a Humble Bundle and that ended up being the only reason that I ended up with this game. 

The game is full of bugs and is unenjoyable to play. The game seems poorly cobbled together, as if the people working on it didn't know that they were all making the same game together. The enemies seem to be able to see your soldiers through walls and even seem to be able to shoot through walls at times to hit your soldiers. When your soldiers first open fire, it seems as if every soldier on the map is suddenly aware of your location regardless of how far away they are. Cover is completely useless in the game because it never seems like your soldiers can really take cover from the enemy. 

The first mission of the game - following the tutorial - is literally impossible to complete simply because of how buggy the game is. I played long enough to try the first mission a few times and never bothered to play the game again after that.

review:
Ja jestem bardzo cierpliwym graczem, ale niestety, ta gra to jeden wielki błąd i nieporozumienie.
W samym samouczku parę razy odniosłem niepowodzenie przez to, że moja postać nie chciała dokonać interakcji z drugą postacią, aby ją wyleczyć.
Może gra przypomina XCOMa, jeżeli chodzi o rozgrywkę, ale przeciwnicy zadają nam normalne obrażenia, mimo tego, że nasza postać jest za osłoną i niestety ta gra często się zawiesza, przez co dla mnie jest niegrywalna, a poza tym pole ruchu postaci, zlewa się z otoczeniem, co utrudnia określenie pola zasięgu naszych żołnierzy.
Niestety odradzam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007549952', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1457314414}
review:
Arma Tactics is a turn-based close-combat strategy game, where the player takes control of a four-member Special Forces team. There are no given strategies, rails to move on, or paths to follow; it‘s up to the player to decide how he will play through both the story-driven missions and generated missions with randomized objectives. Whether using stealth or a more direct approach, players will need to use their strategic thinking and use both basic and advanced weaponry while facing many different opponents - ranging from unorganized local militia to smart and skilled mercenaries.

It all sounds so good and with a quality brand like Armed Assault behind it you expect it to be of the same high standard. Unfortunately this is anything but... the game play is basic, the enemy AI is pitiful as is your own teams. Graphics are sub standard and this game basically reeks. Games of a similar vein wood be Jagged Alliance and X-Com and despite having older release dates than ARMA Tactics they are both so much better. This game lacks atmosphere. Do avoid it and don't get drawn into wasting your money on it like I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056750261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1588579415}
review: Пожалуй, единственное, за что я могу похвалить разработчиков данной поделки это сюжет, пусть он и банален, но он есть и местами даже интересный. Место действия ближний восток, мы играем за группу оперативников которые выполняют различные антитеррористические операции, первая кампания игры посвящена погоне за террористом Солтани, все пять миссий мы гоняемся за ним и наконец завершаем свою миссию уничтожив его. Во второй кампании наши отважные спасатели мира охраняют важный конвой с минометным оружием, но террористам удается захватить оружие. На протяжении второй кампании мы ликвидируем последствия этой ошибки. Вот такая небольшая история о борьбе с терроризмом, а небольшая она, как и сама игра. Нам предлагают всего лишь 10 миссий разбитых на две кампании, где уж тут успеть развиться сюжету. Отдлельно хочется отметить работу дизайнера уровней, лично мне они очень понравились и главное запомнились своим разнообразием и отличной компановкой, за такое малое количество уровней мы будем воевать на взорванном мосту, залезем и спустимся с дамбы, побегаем в небольшом городке и внутри ГЭС.  Мы будем обезвреживать бомбы и прятаться от минометных ударов, спасать своего товарища Дерека Мастерса, чувствуется, что разработчики пытались разнообразить наши задачи изо всех сил и, в общем, то им это удалось, жаль только мизерное количество уровней убило эти старания. Итак перед нами тактическая стратегия в весьма классическом виде, игровой процесс походовый, ходим по очереди вначале все наши солдаты потом все солдаты противника. Вроде как все давно придумано, но авторы Arma Tactics решили откровенно схалтурить и результатом стала весьма посредственная тактическая стратегия. В первую очередь игра напоминает мне Jagged Alliance, но напрочь урезанный, этакая лайт версия игры для планшетов. Брать на миссию мы можем всего четырех бойцов и в арсенале у них всего 4 вида вооружения с натяжкой можно сказать, что пять если считать нож. То есть выбора по сути никакого автоматическая винтовка, пулемет, снайперка и дробовик при этом разница между винтовкой и пулеметом в миссиях настолько мала, что использование последнего совершенно неоправданно (магазин то у него меньше). Дробовик очень ситуационное оружие и далеко не факт, что будем его использовать. Снаряжение представляет собой три сорта гранат, два вида аптечек и совершенно непонятно зачем нужные мины, ведь задач по минированию местности или удержанию обороны в кампании нет. Система развития персонажа вроде бы есть, но для прокачки одного навыка на максимум нам потребуется 2550 очков опыта, а за короткую игру из 10 миссий мы примерно собираем около 3000-4000 опыта. То есть, по сути, прокачать нам на этот опыт никого не получится. Игра вышла на PC год назад и патчей было не мало, но до сих пор в наличие масса глюков, так например без «девелоперской» версии не проходится одна из миссий, возможна стрельба сквозь стены и удар ножом через стену. Интерфейс в целом удобный, но есть кнопка лечения которая появляется над раненным бойцом и её очень легко случайно нажать и совершенно того не желая полечить рядом стоящего бойца, кажется мелочи, но в игре таких вот ляпов и мелочей полно. Графика весьма хороша для планшетов, но на ПК смотрится порядком устаревшей и явно видно, что игра рассчитана на разрешения экранов гораздо меньше чем Full HD. Искусственный интеллект противников это вообще отдельная тема, в большинстве случаев увидев вашего бойца они делают один неприцельный выстрел и бегут к Вам, причем очень часто совершенно пренебрегают прятаться за препятствия. Либо вообще стоят и тупо стреляют по Вам, хотя рядом полно укрытий. Единственную опасность представляют противники за счет своего количества, в среднем наша четверка на каждой миссии уничтожает не менее 15-20 террористов.  Таким образом, сложность игры примерно равна нулю, даже на повышенном уровне сложности играть просто невероятно легко. У Bohemia Interactive были все шансы сделать хорошую игру, но они сделали весьма посредственную и простенькую тактику. Не рекомендую тратить время на PC версию игры, если хотите скоротать время в пути, то возьмите игру себе на планшет она вполне для этого сгодиться, но не более того.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 545, 'last_played': 1643037016}
review:
Tags: Tactical - Squad & Military
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Step down to the old classic tactical games in isometric or topdown form or step up to Xcom2 or something. This is lackluster. 

Bland, Military tactics setting on unity engine. Over the cam moments between movement and most of the audiovisual support is on the okay side of things. Except there are way too many reflections on everything cheapening the immersion, probably to try to wow the player with shinies. Not much of a plot hook or setting to get you interested. Gamepad support was interesting. Game is too simple with lack of combat stances, and limited interactivity. Level design was just a bunch of empty rooms with covers as well as open areas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030997737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1499809643}
review: Wer Jagged Alliance kennt, vor allem die letzten Teile, dem sollte das Spielprinzip bekannt vorkommen. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist aber extrem. Sorgt für Frust wenn man 5-6 Mal eine Mission neu beginnen muss. Trotz ständig in Deckung zu sein, ist es unmöglich durchzukommen. Der Gegner hat 5-6-Fache Übermacht und trifft fast immer. Habe bereits nach der ersten Mission es sein lassen. Unspielbar. Kann ich nicht empfehlen. Da hol ich wieder Jagged Alliance wieder raus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027035640', 'num_games_owned': 1714, 'num_reviews': 315, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1497190630}
review:
Arma Tactics essaye de nous offrir une autre vision de la simulation de combat. 

Ici, adieu la vue à la première personne étouffante de réalisme, et bonjour la vue aérienne, qui vous plonge dans la peau d'un commandant.

Tout est réuni pour que l'éxpérience de jeu soit bonne mais malheureusement, rien qu'à l'entrainemant, ça coince...
Rien n'est expliqué, ou vite fait. On ne comprend rien à ce qu'il se passe et le jeu est bugué à souhaits, la caméra fait n'importe quoi...

Cela rend l'expérience de jeu totalement détestable et rageante. Le jeu est presque même impossible à terminer. C'est vraiment dommage car cela aurait pu être un chouette petit épisode de ARMA...

author: {'steamid': '76561198070962287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1498213564}
review: Bought it in the sale as I enjoyed XCOM and wanted a "real world" equivalent. £1.19 and it was still a waste of money: bugs that were noticed back in 2013 were still here and I was naive enough to think theyd been fixed. Voice acting is abysmal, almost paradying itself. At times its unplayable, as the game forgets to put soldiers in "downed" mode and out right kills them automatically failing the tutorial. I've been shot through walls, the AI stands in the open and then snipe your soldier in the best cover with a Makrov.  Utter disappointment, even 4 years ago this game would have been terrible and a waste of money.  As a fan of the Arma series, this game tarnishes its reputation and makes me ashamed to have even admit I spent real money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255903174', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1552675179}
review:
Одна из лучших игр в жанре "стратегия"
Плюсы:
Проработанный выбор команды(выбор снаряжения каждому члену команды)
Присутствует качественно-проработанная одиночная компания
Много возможностей

author: {'steamid': '76561198078244065', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1175, 'last_played': 1524766880}
review:
Ist vielleicht Geschmackssache und hat vom Gameplay nicht viel mit Arma zu tun, aber ich spiele es wirklich gern. Ich glaube, dass viele schlechte Reviews der Tatsache geschuldet sind, dass man sich wirklich erst einmal in das Spiel finden und es verstehen muss. Und natürlich ist nicht alles Perfekt. Aber Leute das Spiel kostet 6.99 bzw. 1.39 im Sale. Und Bugs habe ich noch keine entdeckt, nur eine manchmal etwas ungünstige Steuerung.
Ich finde es auch ehrlich gesagt etwas unangebracht an so ein Billigspiel die gleichen Maßstäbe, wie an einen Vollpreistitel anzulegen (was ja hier einige Reviewer machen). Vor 10 Jahren wäre dieses Spiel ein Vollpreistitel gewesen und heute macht es -wenn man bereit ist sich auf die Mechanik einzulassen und sich ein bisschen anzustrengen- wirklich Spaß.

Von mir gibt es -entgegen den ganzen Hatern- ein Daumen hoch und eine Kaufempfehlung.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041532773', 'num_games_owned': 445, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1492296784}
review:
Non ci siamo!
Si può passare sopra alla grafica non eccezionale, al comparto sonoro praticamente inesistente, persino alla trama davvero ridicola e all'imprecisione dei comandi, purché almeno la parte strategica si salvi.
Invece anche quella fa schifo.
La maggiorparte delle volte conviene tirare fuori il naso un attimo e poi rintanarsi aspettando che tutta la sarabanda esca allo scoperto per venirvi a cercare e quindi con gli attacchi di interruzione sterminarli senza pietà.
Anche perché se non fate questo e vi smattite per andarli a cercare lo faranno loro e voi morirete, quindi lasciate perdere.
Il problema sorge quando nell'ultima missione della prima "campagna" (ma dai! Non chiamiamola così, è composta da 5 sole misisoni...) misteriosamente non potrete utilizzare i silenziatori e tutti i terroristi africani sono dei cecchini dotati di fucili SVD Dragunov e sono abilissimi tiratori scelti che neanche Il Nemico Alle Porte... ma dai....
Il tutto per allungare il brodo, visto che non c'è neanche un pezzo di carne allora ti costringiamo a mangiare 20 volte la stessa minestra finché non trovi il percorso migliore per uscirne sano e salvo... ANCHE NO GRAZIE.
L'ho preso in humble bundle ad 1 Euro ed è quello che vale considerando che non l'ho neanche completato.

review: I have Arma Tactics on Steam and iOS. I really enjoy the game, however, if you're looking for something with typical Arma graphics and gameplay, this is definitely not it. If you're hoping for an overhead turn-based game, this is exactly it, and it functions quite well with decent graphics and effects to go with it. Arma 3 players may be disappointed though. I happen to enjoy turn based games like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971010557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1489240512}
review:
Resumen: Juego sencillo con combate tactico tipo X-COM, con apenas capa estrategica pero al menos una historia. Estaría bien para pasar el rato, pero la plaga de bugs y cuelgues (de los que te amargan la vida) lo hacen imposible. Recomiendo probar una demo antes de comprar para ver que tal funciona con vuestro sistema, o al menos esperar a las rebajas.

Detalles:
Juego tactico de infanteria moderna por turnos con toques de rol estilo X-COM, Breach & Clear, etc.
Compras equipo y ganas experiencia para mejorar a los miembros de la unidad, aunque todo se antoja muy superficial.
No hay una capa estratégica de juego como en X-COM, pero al menos sí hay una historia y objetivos de misión que enlazan una campaña (a diferencia de Breach & Clear por ejemplo).
El combate táctico es sencillo, muy similar al de los nuevos X-COM, pero da posibilidades suficientes.
Graficamente está bien y no tiene altos requerimientos técnicos (va muy bien en portatiles con algunas tarjetas integradas Intel HD por ejemplo).
El problema: Bugs, crashes, freezes, etc... desde el mismo tutorial que no está muy bien scripteado. No le pasa a todo el mundo, pero si a muchos. Está pidiendo a gritos un parche en condiciones, pero ya hace 4 años que salió y aún está así.
Si quereis un juegazo de este estilo, tendreis que mirar en otra parte (X-COM y sus infinitos clones). Si quereis un juego más casual y de bajo precio recomiendo probar Breah & Clear -este casi solo tiene parte tactica ojo-.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983888792', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1487367255}
review:
The game is awesome. A turn based "shooter", with the option to change loadouts and upgrade equipment.
The only issue is do have with it is that while behind "cover" you should not be able to be shot, when in fact you can be. This kinda defeats the point of being behind cover.
Its annoying but is something you can live with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077445344', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1485658136}
review:
The game is poorly designed, where taking cover makes no difference on your defense, health system is faulty, missions don't make much sense (where you are asked to go stealthy, but it is virtually impossible to do so) and I won't even get to the bug area.
It is playable, but there are some deep design flaws on it that really make this game unworthy playing. (you won't be missing anything)
Edit: I just finished the game and it's worse than i had foreseen, the last mission is absolutely ridiculous. Save yourself some money and time and don't buy it. Don't even accept if it's for free.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967101102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1482292842}

author: {'steamid': '76561198134668996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1481344385}
review:
This game is the most broken turn-based "tactical" shooter I've seen.  Cover means nothing (you will be shot through it), line of sight means nothing (you will be shot when not in it), range means nothing (you will be shot from miles away while behind cover and out of line of sight), grenade arcs mean nothing (it will bounce off of objects on its way to the destination and then detonate to damage anything within about 6 inches)... you get the picture.  The tutorial gets you all set up for something... and then throws you into the first mission against about a dozen enemies where you have no choice but to engage them in a bottleneck.  Tactically, this sound viable right?  Consider the previous issues and you'll relaize it's an exercise in frustration.

It has nothing to do with learning the mechanics.  The mechanics are broken.  There is almost no chance for tactics.  What you end up doing is trying to trick the AI into bumrushing you where you can defend yourself.  Hopefully... but even then you have 3 men against a dozen.  You get overwhlmed.  If anyone dies at any time, it's over.

Listen, I'm stubborn.  I gave this game a shot several times.  I have major problems getting past the first mission.  Most people do.  It's that bad, and it never gets better.  Avoid this game.  Do not even buy it on sale for a dollar; it's not worth the aggrivation and the devs shouldn't be rewarded in any way for this garbage.
Love tactical games like this?  Try Breach & Clear... for a cheap title, at least that game works.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994284366', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1583432908}
review: Управление все время переключается на геймпад. Что характерно данного устройства у меня нет и никогда не было.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048605829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 830, 'last_played': 1481306865}
review:
gioco un po così così, non è brutto, ma ha un po di difetti che non lo rendono perfetto, e vado a spiegare i motivi.
allora sinceramente sono un po indeciso se consigliare o meno questo titolo, a me personalmente è piaciuto, e forse per gli amanti dei giochi tattici a turni, può essere un bel gioco.

PRO:
1) le missioni non sono tanto semplici, quindi questo allunga la longevità, se ti muore anche solo un componente del team, hai fallito e devi riniziare da capo, quindi devi stare molto attento alle mosse che fai
2) è un gioco leggero che gira praticamente ovunque
3) ci sono diverse armi che si possono acquistare (fucile d'assalto, mitragliatrice leggera, fucile a pompa, fucile da cecchino, queste armi possono anche essere potenziate acquistando vari accessori come il silenziatore, il caricatore aumentato, un mirino aggiuntivo e altre cose, poi ci sono svariate granate di diverso tipo (granate, fumogene, flashbang, claymore), ed infine i medikit per curarti durante la partita (essenziali visto che come ho detto come muore un membro hai fallito la missione e devi riniziare da capo, indipendentemente da dove eri arrivato)

CONTRO:
le pecche non mancano
1) ogni tanto capita qualche bug
2) durante il turno del nemico non puoi fare assolutamente niente, puoi solo regolare lo zoom e ruotare la visuale, ma non puoi spostare la visuale per vedere diverse zone della mappa, quindi devi rimanere in attesa senza poter fare niente (e non si può neanche accelerare il tempo per accorciare il turno nemico)
3) non si può salvare durante una partita, quindi se per caso arrivi quasi alla fine della missione e fai una mossa sbagliata facendo morire un tuo membro del team, devi ricaricare il gioco dall'inizio della missione (il salvataggio automatico c'è, ma non è possibile ricaricare durante la missione, ma puoi ricaricare solo quando per esempio chiudi il gioco e lo riapri, ti riparte da dove eri rimasto
4) se durante il turno del nemico, ti uccidono un soldato, non ti da immediatamente la missione fallita, ma i nemici continuano tutti a eseguire le loro mosse perdendo tempo inutilmente perchè tanto appena è il tuo turno, questo morirà senza che tu puoi fare niente, potevano almeno darti il game over immediato.

detto questo alla fine il gioco lo consiglio per chi è amante del genere, non è certo un capolavoro, purtroppo soffre molto il fatto che sia un porting della versione mobile, ma preso in sconto non è neanche così tanto male, di certo saprà farti divertire per diverse ore, e comunque è un tipo di gioco non troppo impegnativo, nel senso che puoi giocartelo comodamente anche dal divano col portatile per fare un missione e poi chiuderlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035506750', 'num_games_owned': 637, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 973, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 898, 'last_played': 1584191763}

author: {'steamid': '76561197997829089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 252, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1478901764}
