author: {'steamid': '76561198037152649', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1430640908}
review:
[h1]ArmA однажды - ArmA навсегда![/h1]
[i]ArmA Tactics - еще 1 продукт, вставший в доблесные ряды игр серии ArmA! [/i] Ура! Ура! Ураааа! :)
   [u]Ужасный, неудобный, отталкивающий[/u] - именно такие слова приходят в голову, когда заходит разговор о игровом процессе игры. Действительно, я уверен, большенсто игроков согласяться со мной. Наверняка всем играющим, мягко говоря, не нравится то, как сделанно управление в игре, как же [u]ужасно[/u] расположена кнопка "лечить своего товарища по комманде", появляющаяся из ниоткуда, когда необходимо совершить ход, как же сложно пройти в здание, из-за его крыши, которая то появляется, то проподает. К ужасу игрового процесса, добавляются ошибки игры, которые, не смотря на простоту решения, ужасно [u]мешают[/u], и иногда даже затавляют отказаться от игры. Графика точно не соответствует играм своей серии, AI - ужасен, звуковая составляющая - [u]не то, что ожидалось[/u], разнообразие игрового процесса сводится к 2 вещам: убить и добраться. Разнообразие выбора, подобно разнообразию игрового процесса, [u]сводится к минимуму[/u]. Так, например, игроку предлогается на выбор целых 4 (!)  вида вооружения! Среди них: автомат (вроде M4), "снайперская" винтовка (вроде M14), пулимет (вроде M249), дробовик (вроде M1014). Все. Только M4, M14, M249, M1014, и каждое оружие сделанно как игрушечное подобие, не способное стрелять дальше 20 метров. Ко всему этому "разнообразию" можно приписать еще нож, гранаты, мины.
   Вывод из вышесказанного:
   Сложив картину в целый фрагмент, считаю, что [u]игра потраченных денег не стоит[/u]. НО! Несмотря на все недостатки, несмотря на всю эту узкость мысли, несмотря на ужасную реализацию, [u]игра достойна к прохождению[/u], но лишь тех людей, кто по праву считает себя настоящи любителем игр серии ArmA. Иным же даже пытаться не стоит. 

P.S. Игра достойна попытки поиграть, и я думаю, что найдет своих "фанатов". Я, например, полюбил эту игру :)
P.S.S. [u]Наверное, читающим только подчеркнутый текст было не понятно.[/u]

author: {'steamid': '76561198102385608', 'num_games_owned': 2465, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 820, 'last_played': 1439027835}
review:
Очередной пошаговый шутер.
Не люблю писать плохие обзоры, но ....
На меня он произвел довольно неприятное впечатление.
По игре :
Мы имеем очередную группу американских солдат, несущих демократию всем и вся. На деле - унылые, где-то страдающими проблемами со зрением клоуны.
Плюсы:
+ желание играть в пошаговки меня еще не покинуло
Минусы:
- Система прокачки не дает вам ощутимых бонусов к оружию (прокачка аптечек - еще куда ни шло)
- Пулеметы - туфта. Получились совершенно неудачно. Унылая палка.
- Непонятный разброс точности у снайперки. Для точного выстрела требуется два очка действия, при выстреле с одним очком ваш боец закидывается морфином и скорей прострелит себе яйки, чем попадет в противника.
- Всего 10 миссии, длительностью от 20 до 40 минут. Почему минус ? Бойцы ползают как чертовы черепахи, в некоторых я уже засыпал, пока мои носители демократии наконец пробегут эти 20 метров. 
- Не заметить врага, стоящего в метре от вас - обычное дело.
- Враги вас не заметят в чистом поле за 20 метров, но спокойно видят сквозь крышу.
- Чтобы открыть ящик, вам придется постараться, чтобы правильно навести маркер на кнопку открытия.
- Зарезать врага - та же история. 
- Бойцы могут промахнуться, даже стоя к врагу вплотную.
- Баженое управление передвижением. Иногда можно бежать за край зоны движения, а иногда - фиг кликнешь по ней самой.
- Ход противника могут нам не показать, даже если противник встал прямо перед нами.
- Та же ерунда с ранениями - играешь себе, и вдруг замечаешь, что у бойца всего 20 хп, а когда он все потерял непонятно.
- Если бойцы стоят рядом и выбран один из них - при выборе второго вы скорее истратите аптечку на его хил, чем его выберете.
- Камера от третьего лица, включающаяся иногда - уныла. Показывая бег, выгядит как припадок эпилепсии у оператора, бегущего сзади.
Мой совет - брать эту игру только в том случае, если вы тащитесь от пошаговых тактических шутеров до такой степени, что хотите от них детей. 
Оценка - 1/10. 1 только из жалости к разработчикам за их безполезно потраченное время.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089633961', 'num_games_owned': 356, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1419268776}
review: Just.... no.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963161776', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1453985467}
review:
This game could be fun but needs a lot of improvement. The mechanics and content are very limited, and most importantly there are a lot of issues.

This game is a badly done smartphone port. The controls are uncomfortable on a computer, and there's issues with the camera. For example, it's sometimes difficult to position the camera properly to see under/around parts of the terrain, such as the bridge in the first mission of the second campaign.

There are also several game-breaking bugs that make it hard, if not impossible, to complete missions. I've seen enemies shooting through roofs and even enemies triggering cut scenes and events that only the player is supposed to trigger, thus ruining a long and difficult mission just near the end, and making it impossible to complete the first mission of a campaign.

The devs don't seem to respond to bug reports anymore and have apparently left these game-breaking bugs there for the players to deal with.

Don't buy this game, unless you like bugs or enjoy spending money on a game that cannot be completed.

review:
Dieses Spiel ist gurchaus unterhaltsam, es macht wirklich Spass sein vorgehen langsam zu planen und umzusetzen.
Das ganze ist in Deutsch und für zwischendurch jederzeit geeignet. Die einzelnen Missionen lassen sich je nach Vorgehensweise in 2 bis 3 Stunden bewältigen. Leider gibt es keine Erweiterungen , aber es ist auf jeden Fall eine Empfehlung wert für alle die ein wenig Tactic mögen, und der Preis spricht für sich.

review: This is a surprisingly fun game to play once you learn the controls. The AI is what it is, but for the most part the game is very enjoyable and a bargain for $10 (or less). It is kind of like Full Spectrum Warrior, but has enough of its own personality to make it a worthwhile gaming investment. It is actually quite nice looking in terms of graphics as well, and has one of the best implementations of an in-mission map overlay that I have seen in any video game.

review: As a mad Fallout Tactics fan I just had to get this. At it's original release it was a little limiting and had a few game breaking bugs which probably leads to it's initial bad wrap. Do not be fooled however, this game has come a long way with updates, and extra campaigns. This is well worth the asking price now if not more so ($8.99 at time of writing). If turn based shooters like Xcom, Jaggard Alliance and Fallout are your thing add this to your library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011153131', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 839, 'last_played': 1506839170}
review: It's an alright game, but I wouldn't really recommend this game. Very basic plot, poor dialogue, very little to customize, hard to start off in the gmae. There are no achievements in the game even though it says there are some there, you cannot earn any of the achievements listed at all, I dunno why, but probably because the games bugged too much… If you really want to play this game, just get yourself CheatEngine or GameConqueror and look for the HEX Data for Credits to max it out just so you can purchace XP, Weapons and Skill upgrades to play through the game with fair chance of survival to beat the game. I don't normally condone cheating in games, but this is plenty worth cheating your way through this game since there's nothing significant to get out of playing it, and its only Single Player game anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089927652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1412082200}
review:
Начну с пугающей фразы: игра не для слабонервных!!! Без определенного опыта игры в пошаговые тактические "думалки" нажатие кнопки "В корзину" строжайше запрещается!!! Этот шедевр предназначен для людей с крепкими нервами и приличным количеством свободного времени. Пройти эпизод с первого раза нереально, со второго/третьего/десятого раза-затруднительно. Приобретая эту игру, готовьтесь думать, долго и тщательно выбирать позиции для бойцов, укрытия, модель поведения, снаряжение, пути отхода. Вариантов прохождения очень много, уровни отнюдь не однообразные, каждое прохождение приносит огромное удовольствие, никогда не знаешь, за каким поворотом тебя ждет "сюрприз" с АК-47 или РПК. Снайперы доставляют адские неудобства. Члены отряда не бессмертные, двух-трех очередей будет достаточно, чтобы свести на нет ваш боевой дух и количество живых морпехов в вашем отряде. Умеете думать-берите однозначно. Не готовы тратить минуты, десятки минут на обдумывание тактики- эта игра не для Вас. 
Кратко насчет графики: на уровне 2010-2011 гг.
Сюжетные кампании весьма неплохие, все продумано и довольно-таки оригинально.

review: Arma Tactics ist ein Spiel, dass man immer mal zwischendurch spielen kann. Die rundenbasierenden Vorgehensweisen regen immer zur Umplanung bzw. Umdenken der eigenen Strategie an. Tactics ist eine schöne Erweiterung zu den anderen Arma - Spielen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043971033', 'num_games_owned': 624, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1408315171}
review:
Modern military squad/turn-based strategy brought to you by people who make great simulation games (especially military ones)! Sounds pretty great right? WRONG. Everything about this game is poorly done. Ahem. For instance, cover doesn't matter, a grenade will stop pretty much immediately as soon as it touches something (You know how bouncing/rolling grenades are actual military and videogame techniques? Not here), AI is incredibly stupid and are perfectly unaware of anything SPRINTING behind them and is totally willing to stand out in the open instead of laying traps or taking cover (which would really be a great idea, because my men are so accurate that the game isn't even close to a challenge when fighting at range), and the UI sucks and results in a mess of missclicks. Still not convinced this game is bad? There is no music, the sound effects are completely uninmpressive, the visuals are just okay, the squad isn't remotely worth listening to, any items you use on a mission have to be bought with credits beforehand (and you have to either grind or be efficient to get them), and worst of all is that amongst only 10 or so premade missions and some badly constructed random missions is that THE GAME HAS NO MULTIPLAYER. And none of this helps how horribly buggy it is too. Frequently my men would stop dead a few paces away from where I told them to go. Locations that were totally accesible were avoided by my men, and areas that you couldn't pass a grenade through they were willing to try. I got shot though walls twice in ten minutes.

TL;DR: Everything is shittily slapped together and it's not even good for a laugh or a quick game with some friends. A game that could have been a great battle of wits has no multiplayer to speak of. Heartbreaking really. 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197961161813', 'num_games_owned': 637, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1406431055}
review:
Spending just a bit of time with ARMA Tactics, I had high hopes as I love tactical turn-based strat games. Regrettably, this game turned out to be a serious letdown with no reward.

The premise is you control a tactical ops team of 4 soldiers, doing various missions in the middle-east.....yep pretty generic set piece.

After completing the tutorial, it seemed like it was going to be fairly solid in terms of gameplay, but this quickly transitioned to the first level being massive and extremely challenging (set on default difficulty). After 30min and struggling with bugs and poor input for the soliders, I lost 1 solider and lost the game. Quite frankly it was a rage quit at that point.

The game is need of serious balancing, and another pass at controls. Too many options overlap just mouse-clicking which in turn creates incidents of mis-set actions, which 'could' have been mitigated with an undo option....but nope.

I appreciate the genre they tackled here, but it's a game that just doesn't come together sadly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007006002', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1467205444}
review: В принципе, довольно приличная игра. К сожалению, не зацепила ни сюжетом, ни боевкой. Команду подбирать нельзя, миссии прямолинейны. Отдельный минус за бесполезные пулеметы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024300555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1467458956}

author: {'steamid': '76561197966164461', 'num_games_owned': 990, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1181, 'last_played': 1406322618}
review:
Despite moments of brilliance, this game is exceptionally buggy.

Generally, ARMA tactics is a decent, but limited, turn-based tactics game.  The turn system, action points, and interrupt systems are all pretty standard but well implemented.  The level designs are OK and the graphics aren't bad either.  Unfortunately, all of this is rendered moot by an avalanche of bugs that make the game nearly unplayable.  Little things like:
1)  The "Continue" button (which should continue your game from the last mission you were on) on the Main Menu doesn't work and typically just hangs the program.
2)  Building a custom mission and selecting "Random" for the map type always results in the first map (African Town I) being chosen.
3)  Custom mission type "Terrorist Hunt" results in the terrorist you are hunting LITERALLY DISAPPEARING OFF THE MAP, making it impossible to complete the mission.
4)  Multiple bugs in campaign missions making them impossible to complete without replaying repeatedly and hoping not to encounter the bug.
5)  Weapon modeling is nearly non-existent.  While the sniper rifle has a longer range and appears to crit more often, M-4s and SAWs do about the same damage at about the same range... with no suppress function for the SAW.

Bottom line:  at $9 it is OK, but extremely frustrating.  Suggest X-COM or one of the Jagged Alliance sequels instead

author: {'steamid': '76561197987292682', 'num_games_owned': 945, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1410105640}
review:
A big disappointment. I was a fan of both the first ARMA games (played original operation flashpoint and ARMA 1 and 2), and a fan of tactical turn based strategy games, like Jagged Alliance, 7.62 high caliber and Silent Storm. This game will not appeal to fans of either genre, as is not as near as “realistic” as the ARMA series, nor a heavy tactical game. It’s more like casual tactics for the casual gamer. In games like Jagged Alliance you could shoot from different positions (standing, kneeling, prone) and spend AP to aim (a “snapshot” or a “aimed shot”). In this game you don’t have any of that, and can only choose form spending 2 AP or 1 on a shot, but no further aiming gameplay.
The story is non existent. It’s just a straight forward army game (maybe the only aspect similar to the original ARMA series) against your random “terrorist”. You cant’ “build” your team, since you can’t choose your solders, and both the experience system (to improve skills) and the weapon system are very limited. Another drawback for me was that you can’t really build “random missions” like in the ARMA series, you can just replay the maps with different goals, but not really design a mission.
It might be a good cellphone game, but it’s totally out of league for a PC game.

I payed less than 2 dollars for it, since I bought it on sale, and still feel I payed to much. AVOID this game, you are better of buying XCOM or Jagged Alliance.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989885643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1404994999}
review: As a huge fan of turn based strategy game I was very disappointed with this title. The tutorial seemed like it may be a good game, but on the first mission I ran into too many issues to continue playing. Shooting an enemy at point blank range with an M4 did not kill the enemy. Also, cover is always huge in TBS games and both my squad and the enemies were able to shoot through walls. What's the point of using strategy and position if you can just shoot through walls? Waste of time/money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032003443', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1436554294}
review: Странный сын-инвалид xcom и jagged alliance back in action. Кнопка продолжения миссии не работает (ведет к бесконечной загрузке). Зависла нафиг на второй миссии возле дамбы. Баганутое говно вообщем, непонятно зачем вытащеное с планшетов. Ей богу, если хотите нормальной тактики, поиграйте в xcom enemy unknown (которую портировали на планшеты)

author: {'steamid': '76561198086432779', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1442166381}
review:
Поиграл часок. Вспомнил про кучу старых игр, типа Jagged Alliance 2, Gorky 17. Да эти игры в разы лучше!
Если же интересны новинки, то лучше поиграйте в X-COM: EU. Но не в этот шлак.
Неудобное управление, есть обучение, но в нем только те аспекты, которые и без него непонятны.
Если вы играли в вышеупомянутые игры (хотя бы в XCOM), но управление вас будет бесить.


P.S.: для планшета может и норм игрушка, но никак не для PS.
Оценка 5\10

author: {'steamid': '76561197989224389', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 1099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1007, 'last_played': 1471671850}
review:
The game is relatively short.  But you can replay it.  I had a great time playing it.  

It has a Demo if you want to try it out before you buy it.  Recommended.

If you have problems starting the game set the version to developer mode to get it to work.  Right click on game in your steam library and look at the different tabs.  Similar to setting it to how you would set other games to beta mode in the steam profile, only its called developer mode instead of beta mode. 

I'm hoping they come out with more missions and add ons.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019327613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1417220232}
review:
When I booted up Arma:Tactics I saw what I wanted to see out of the whole arma franchise,the franchise was just asking to make it an strategy game.The only thing I would recommend to the creators is to follow the steps of the Wargame series with the graduall expansion of the content,because it does lack some of it.

+Story Line

-No vehicles
-Not as many weapons as you thought

Overall Score: 1/2  -Like I said it does lack some content so it dosn't seem fair to judge it by my professional score system,that's why it's only half of what it could be,"Expansion could make it better...no,they will"

author: {'steamid': '76561197966527290', 'num_games_owned': 3788, 'num_reviews': 473, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1442699645}
review: "Furieusement dédié aux tablettes avant tout, Arma Tactics n’est donc clairement pas à conseiller en dehors de l’AppStore et du marché Android. Sur Steam, le titre n’a pas beaucoup d’intérêt et pêche par un manque de renouvellement de contenu, de style graphique des différents scénarios. Enfin, il oublie de proposer des sauvegardes fixes entre les missions d’un scénario, obligeant le joueur (même nomade) à tout recommencer en cas de bêtise. C’est dommage car cela démotive un peu une fois de retour sur le choix du mode de jeu." - GameSideStory.com http://www.gamesidestory.com/2014/06/03/gametest-arma-tactics-pc-ios-android/

author: {'steamid': '76561197972670619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1401626171}
review:
Very very poor. Buggy, with a very poor layout and very limited tactical options.

You can't even choose the direction you face your claymore mines for gods sake, so you have to waste a whole action point turning your inept stupid soldier around so he doesn't kill your whole squad by arming a claymore in their face....

The chances to hit are random, sometimes grenades go off by enemies feet and do no damage, cover is basically meaningless.

Voice acting and the writing is terrible. Really this game was rushed out to make a few bucks out of people who like squad turn based strategy. Don't buy it, even on offer I regret the £1.xx I paid for this lump of steaming .... you get the picture.

2/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971110079', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1446691111}
review:
You should know that this is actually a port of a mobile game. It's simplified, but it still enjoyable enough. No, it's not Jagged Allience, and it's no where near the full Arma games, but it works. 

There is a good deal of frustation when it comes to the interface. It's not good about telling you how many AP remain, nor how much you'll spend moving to a given point. More than likely, you'll find yourself moving to places accidentally, ruining whole turns.

Don't buy it at full price, but on sale for a buck or two, it's not bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137135249', 'num_games_owned': 422, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1401123604}
review:
I'm still going to give this game some more chance.. may change to positive review later. But for now, kind of annoyed / bored by it, with less than an hour in. Played the tutorial, which is fine. The voice acting tries a little too hard and is kind of annoying. Would rather there be no story than an annoying one. The camera controls also end up being annoying, when you're dragging your soldier's footpath, the camera doesn't automatically follow toward your destination, so you have to stop, move the camera, then try again. 

I gave it another try recently and played the first mission. Turns out, if one of your guys dies, and you don't have anyone to stabilize him, then game over. No permadeath allowed. Pfft. Annoyed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036810881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1129, 'last_played': 1402068728}
review: Задумка хорошая, на этом хорошее заканчиваеться. Сюжет откровенно слабый, сделана криво, постоянно глючит. Постоянно в моем понимании это каждый второй-третий запуск игры/карты, давно не встречал таких глючных игр. Вспомнил пиратские игры начала 2000-х годов. Купить можно, но максимум за 1 доллар.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008921247', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 666, 'last_played': 1398787718}
review:
There is definitely some potential in this game - and it's not without some play value. (I spent 11 hours playing it, after all - enough to complete one of the two available story campaigns.)  That said, it feels a bit incomplete...  only one weapon of each type to unlock, only a very basic selection of non-weapon gear, no advancement aside from raising scores on a few basic skills which boil down to "walking", "shooting", etc.  If there was a bit more depth here, I'd definitely recommend, but as things stand, the poor AI and shaky gameplay make this a thumbs-down.  A few examples:

With 2 AP per character per turn, a lot of the tactical decisions involve guesswork.  A few examples of the sort of tactical frustration you'll encounter:

 "I guess moving here will give me line of sight to that exposed enemy...  hm, nope, invisible wall blocks my shot.  Guess I'll wait til next turn"

"I guess I'll wait here in overwatch so the enemy will come to me, since none of my guys have good LOS...  hm, nope, they shuffled a half step and hit everyone - I guess that low wall wasn't really giving me cover in that direction"

It's a shame, because this game is very close to being a great high-value squad tactics game.  A few quick fixes to gameplay, and/or some added content (more campaign levels, advancement options, gear, etc) would make this a definite winner.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999819734', 'num_games_owned': 521, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1400345033}

author: {'steamid': '76561198101891520', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1400419691}
review:
For the money i paid (1.72) it is good. I got this game in the Bohemia sale. I think it is good for the money i paid, i wouldnt pay any more than three dollars for it, 
POSITIVE THINGS: 
High Framerate
Okay Storyline
Great Mission Setups
Good Loudout Menu

There arent really any negative things i can say about this game other than it is kind of buggy, and the cinematics are pretty bad. 

I have played this game for maybe an hour and i would definently play it in the future, I see myself playing when i have no internet connection, i am traveling, or none of my friends are on to play any other game. 

This game is realistic somewhat, Realism meaning the squad gameplay, you move up with your squad and you can only move one character 10 meters i think that is great because it is a close quarters combat game, and you dont want to move up 50 meters with any one guy (unless you know what you are doing). 

If there was a way to integrate multiplayer that would be awesome, a 4v4 Deathmatch with no respawns, 8 rounds max that would be amazing. You can communicate with your squad and play as a team overall, or you can be the lone wolf and go snipe on top of a building. each player should get a max of 30 seconds to move, that would be great in my opinion. 

ANY FPS GAMER WOULD LOVE THIS GAME

Overall i give this game a 8/10 
It is great and i love it. 
Thanks for reading and GAME ON

author: {'steamid': '76561197965196232', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 1348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1224, 'last_played': 1419621610}
review:
Petit jeu pas mauvais du tout, un mixte entre Xcom (le dernier) et Frontline Tactics (plus proche de ce dernier), avec un game play simple, rapide de prise en main et stratégique, il va falloir utiliser au mieux les différents couverts du jeu (vous ou un pas beau derrière un mur on vous touche plus) savoir contourner ça cible, utiliser le couteau ou les silencieux … et co.

Par contre  il peut être améliorer, déjà avoir un choix plus vaste au niveau des armes (que 4 armes là), supprimer ce système de 2 actions par perso par un bon vieux système à l'ancienne une bonne vielle barre d'action (ici les 2 PA sont moins soûlant que dans Xcom) et soyons fou pourquoi pas un éditeur de map le jeu si prête bien.

Hélas pas mal de petit bug … déjà éviter les toits on voie à travers le plancher (et ça marche dans les 2 sens). Certaines map déraillent un peu, l’intérieur du barrage en partie libre l'ennemi ne fini jamais son 1er tour (alt+f4 -_-) la mission Ombre petit bug dans la misse à jour des objectifs qui peu vous forcer à recommencer si on fait comme moi la 1er fois: mettre les 4 commandos à la mm sortie.

Pas moche peu mieux faire, attendez toute fois une promo 7euro c'est un peu trop chère là.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972308098', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1445018719}
review:
Unfortunatly I wasn't able to get very far into this game due to the bugs present in the game, and the poor interface. This appears to be a quickly put together clone of the wildly popular, and good, game XCOM Enemy Unknown. However, this is also a poorly done port of a mobile game which explains the terrible interface for a PC, and likely the number of bugs.

Turn-based games are my favorite kind of game. But this one was just too poorly implemented for me to even play it very long.

review:
This is an awesome game! BUT DO NOT BUY IT...YET!

Wait for this game to hit a special of under $10 and buy it.
That being said buy it right now at the time of writing this the cost is $8.99 and I think that game even broken is worth it.
I do not feel it is worth $14 in a state where I can not complete the game.

If you could complete the game I would pay over $30 for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064156757', 'num_games_owned': 3338, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 59908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 11323, 'playtime_at_review': 5595, 'last_played': 1710406673}
review:
Arma Tactics is a turn-based close-combat strategy game, where you take control of a four-member Special Forces team. There are no given strategies, rails to move on, or paths to follow; it‘s up to you to decide how you will play through both the story-driven missions and generated missions with randomized objectives. Whether using stealth or a more direct approach, you will need to use your strategic thinking and use both basic and advanced weaponry while facing many different opponents - ranging from unorganized local militia to smart and skilled mercenaries.

With highly replayable missions, achievements, weapons to unlock and two single-player campaigns, Arma Tactics offers many hours of intense ever-changing action.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079877212', 'num_games_owned': 670, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1433347302}
review:
Прежде чем писать этот отзыв, я прочитал отзывы других игроков... Смешные нынче геймеры. Кто-то сразу заговорил, что игра должна быть для планшета и не более. Кто то делал отсылки к серии X-COM... Эх, молодеж, молодеж... Не играли вы часами в Командос и Cold Zero... 

Конечно сегодня игра кажеться устаревшей. Она слабее Командос и Cold Zero, но не лишена своего приятного шарма, для любителей жанра. Графика весьма приличная даже на сегодняшний день.

В игре есть сюжет. Есть прокачка навыков. В игре надо думать, и действовать очень аккуратно, противник не такой уж глупый и весьма меткий.

Оценка: [b]7[/b] из [b]10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198037528066', 'num_games_owned': 652, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1393741528}
review:
Just got this game from the Bohemia Humble Bundle. first, this game was made for mobile devices, just ported to PC, so the graphics doesn't look that good, the game is lacking for a typical tactical squad strategy game and it is very, very, different, from the main series ArmA.  so even if you like the ArmA games, there's no guarantee you will like this one.

Not recommended from a PC standpoint, from a mobile device point of view, a decent game.

If you are looking for a tactical game like this for PC, get XCOM: Enemy Unknown instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101894856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1393002607}
review:
Как же бесконечно далеко этой поделке до Silent Storm и Jagged Alliance... Даже до современного переосмысления Jagged Alliance - Back in Action ей очень далеко. Тупые противники, насмерть заскриптованные миссии, глючащее управление, весьма посредственная графика (даже для выходца с мобильных платформ). Суть - лучше бы порт на PC для этой игры не делали вообще. О покупке (даже со скидкой) жалею.

PS. Стим почему-то сбросил мою статистику по игре. Отыграно часа три примерно, а в профиле - будто бы и не запускал. Странно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019355296', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1664451600}
review:
I love this game, it's really fun. I think it's in alpha or something because it says "press Y" and "press X" and displays buttons on an Xbox controller at times, crashes a few times and is kinda buggy so I'm not sure if they're fixing that but I can live with it.
This is a tactical turnbased shooter. You can customize your 4 soldiers with one of four weapons; either an assault rifle, a shotgun, a sniper or an LMG, and they all work like you'd expect them to. You get credits after each mission to spend on upgrading the weapons or buying medpacks and grenades and stuff like that for your soldiers.
I love this game because it's so tactical, it feels just like playing ArmA except everything is turn-based. You place your marksman on a remote roof overlooking everything, the LMG guy gets into a position with clear view while your assault guys move up and advance on the enemy, and then you just let it rip.
Like I said, it's kinda buggy at times, like sometimes it's almost impossible to avoid pressing the melee button even though you're not actually pressing it (the button for melee is at an enemy's feet while you're close to him) and you end up meleeing an enemy even though you didn't want to and you don't have time to get to cover and you get downed. Stuff like that but they may have fixed it, haven't played this in forever.
This game is like an 8/10 or a 9/10. Only reason that I haven't played more is because there's a campaign and not a set of randomly generated missions so it's kind of boring to play over and over again, unless you wait a few months before doing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999683974', 'num_games_owned': 854, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1435804675}

author: {'steamid': '76561197990523893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 271, 'playtime_forever': 496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1659564247}
review:
Arma Tactics is a very basic turn based strategy game where you command a small squad of men. Similiar to XCOM, Jagged Alliance 2, or stuff like that.

Its okay its the core design of a possibly good and deep game here but the only problem its not deep. If you play the first mission the rest are basically the same thing over and over. There are only 3 weapons, LMB, AR, and Sniper rifle, and affording the sniper is a pain in the butt because grenades and medkits. You can upgrade your squad members but you need to exit to the main menu then go back into the game. Its idiotic and on top of that the upgrades don't make a huge diffrence so its like why bother? And unless you explore the menu you would probably never know you could even upgrade them.

Its extremely basic and would be great as a pick up and play...mobile...game....on android....iOS
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARMA_Tactics
WELL WHAT DO YOU KNOW. Thats what it is. Unfortunately its a game thats main focus was a mobile market. So pick up and play was what they wanted. And since most people don't want a hardcore deep game while on the train or waiting room its fairly basic like solitaire or checkers. So if I had played this on a mobile setting I would have probably enjoyed it though I find it strange that it has no PSVita port or WiiU or even a home console version.

The AI is nothing special and will just throw men at you most the time so its relatively easy. The only challenge comes from when your men keep missing over and over or when AI just thrown at you en masse to the point it just makes you lose man after man because you simply can't handle the amount its throwing at you.

Its not bad but theres just not much content here. Thers nothing really to say about it I guess. They could have gone buckwild and added a metric done of content like in Arma 2 comparatively.

But what is bad I have noticed is that sometimes enemies can shoot you through walls or ceilings which is just plain bullcrap. Aswell at one point I was detected while trying to do a stealth mission and a squad mate got wounded when shot through a window. Except it was one of those type of windows game designers put in a map or area to fill up space and you cant see through because the glass is blocked with newspapers or some crap. In any other game you would expect that window to be basically just a painting on the wall in terms of gameplay. But instead the AI can see and shoot through it but you cant! Shooting through walls gets really annoying but this is just idiotic.  Sometimes grenades will hit something in the air you can't seen and not go where you want them to at all, and much more annoyingly your well trained and well armed American soldeirs will miss a shot directly in front of them while Jihadis mess them up in all kinds of Mujah ways. This randomness can really drain you from wanting to play the game along with casually enraging you. 

So to sum this up, its just okay. Not worth much more than $5 if you want to play it on a stationary system but a worthy diversion if you want to blow 20 to 30 minutes waiting for something. But if you want something more deep than a very bare bones TBS there are better games for you such as Expeditions: Conquistador or either of the ones mentioned at the start. If you have a mobile device I would atleast consider buying this game along with GTA Vice City and Max Payne 1 (both on Android market).

Its really not that fun though unless you play it in short spurts to waste time.

review:
还不错的一个游戏。
虽然有各种不太尽人意的设定，AP太少、武器太少、不能原地改变单位朝向等等，不过作为该系列的一次尝试还是比较成功地的。
最后友情提示，如果感觉第一个战役太容易，不要紧，第二个战役能让你满足的。（第一关就被虐出翔了。看样子要把小队经验练上去再打）

author: {'steamid': '76561197994681687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1490141632}
review: New to the Arma community? Then this is the worst game to buy. Please try an Arma that feels more complete, such as Arma 2 or Arma 3 or even just plain old Arma. This game manages to make the AI in Arma feel actually less intelligent then  in Arma 2. So yeah, unless you happened to receive this game along with the Humble Bundle, save your money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036082570', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1420930532}
review:
I played for a bit and already noticed some bugs, like when you try to move a soldier somewhere he cannot get to because the path is blocked by other soldiers, the game will not advance (smoke still plays, but the soldier will just be standing there and nothing happens). Also, when you decide to restart a mission you lose your bought gear and points?
I got the game from the Humble Bundle and not directly from Steam, but I wouldn't recommend on buying it. If you are a hardcore fan of this genre, try other games (other reviewers name them). If you're more like me, and just want to try out something new, this game COULD be fun for you, if you don't mind the bugs. Cannot say too much about the story at this point, but I actually like the graphics in this game - not too overwhelming but not bad either. Gameplay is quite simple but by no means easy (at least for me). If you already have it or get it as a gift, try it, otherwise you might want to think twice about buying it on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068920878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 859, 'last_played': 1410536231}
review:
The basic idea was sound : a turn based tactical game. 

10 maps, I can't say how disappointed I am by this small fact...

The IA sucks. 

The levelling is tedious, and it does not make that big a difference. A weapon skill at 25 gives you like 5% more chances to hit. The number generator is also odd, I've just missed twice in a row on a 85% chance to hit...

Maybe, with 2 or 3 additionnal campaigns, it might become an interesting game. As it is, I'll recommend to avoid it at all costs.

review:
I like this game much more than I thought I would.  I expecially like that it's a linux title too, so I can play it cross platform on whatever I choose.  It certainly needs some more time in BI's oven, as do most of their games.  But like the rest of their games, it's built on a very solid foundation that will continue to improve for the life of the game.  

I like the game as is, and I know from experience that it was a sound investment in terms of entertainment value.  It'll only get better, too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076575216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1502354355}
review:
Игра на единицу, причем во всех отношениях, фиг с ней с графой, в тактических играх не она главное, в ней нет не единого плюса.
Сюжет высосан из пальца младенца с черного континента, вам дают мегакрутой спецотряд из целых 4 человек, в начале сюжета покажут как негр ржет над нами что мы приперлись без боеприпасов и глушителей, и отправят на 2 недели ранее,потом будет последняя миссия, где надо разминировать 3 бомбы на заводе и у врага заложники, но нам запрещают пользоваться глушителями (хотя от глушителей толку и так 0)
Геймплей доставляет не хуже, наши бравые вояки в упор мажут, интерфейс неудобный и аскетичный, регулярные ошибки и вылеты на рабочий стол дополняют картину этой поделки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045775323', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1449999382}
review:
This is a game that i'll be playing a lot more when (if) I'll be old. It takes 1 friggin' hour to complete 1 (ONE) mission, and usually by that 1 hour point something bad happens, like suddenly, an ambush of 4 enemies out of nowhere, a sniper that you didn't see yet went past him ten times, the second coming of jesus, and so on. Long story short, you're gonna loose (a lot), and you're gonna have to start all over again right from the beginning of the mission! such fun!

But seriously, if you dig games like Gorky 17 and Jagged Alliance, then this is your best bet.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992885335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 578, 'last_played': 1391855516}
review:
I purchased this game at the 2013 Xmas sale, but didn't play it right away. The game has since been included in a Bohemia Interactive Humble Weekly Sale, so the game may have gained a number of players since its release.

It always saddens me when I have to write a negative critique about a GNU/Linux game (even if it's a proprietary one), but this game was very buggy and really left me with no choice... so here goes it.

The first problem I noticed was when tossing a grenade from behind cover. Although the line indicating where the grenade would be thrown looked fine, the grenades would always hit the cover you were behind and you would blow yourself up. By the time I completed the game, I had probably killed my team members with grenades more than the enemy. Needless to say, I didn't use them much.

Shortly thereafter, I discovered that I wasn't unlocking any Steam achievements. Some people in the forums indicate that they also have this problem occasionally, but even though I completed the game I never obtained a single achievement. I personally like collecting achievements so I found this particularly frustrating.

Completing the first campaign (out of the two included) didn't take very long. After completing the last level of the first campaign, the stats screen appeared (as it normally did at the end of each level) except there was [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225666344]no Continue button[/url]. This made sense since it was the last level, and it still had two other buttons - "Restart" and "Main Menu". Clicking Main Menu did absolutely nothing. I didn't want to restart, and I didn't want to lose my progress, so I did the only thing I could immediately think to try ran the kill command on the game process ID.

Unfortunately, that didn't save my progress either. Possibly a SIGQUIT instead of a SIGTERM would have been better, but in any case I had to replay that level from scratch... and when I completed it a second time I had the same issue reappear yet again! This time around I pressed ALT+F4 to close the program, and that command did enable the game to save my progress and unlock the next campaign. Presumably ALT+F4 is the equivalent of a SIGQUIT.

A couple of levels later and I came to a mission whereby I was instructed to send two soldiers to one exit on the map, and two to another exit. I tried this many many times, and every time the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225665670]level would freeze[/url]. Not cool. Eventually (searching through the game forums) I discovered that the only way to complete the level was to ignore the mission objectives and just kill everyone on the level. That wasn't hard, but it took time to find some of the enemies hiding and it was certainly not obvious that doing this would have any impact on the game not working.

One other problem I noticed throughout the entire game was that sometimes the lines which indicate how far you can move in a turn [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225666021]would not appear[/url]. Sometimes they would be completely missing, and other times just part of the lines were missing. This was certainly an annoyance when it occurred, and by the end of the second campaign it had happened a lot.

The last annoyance that I'll write about here was that the soldiers would often not do what I wanted them to. If I only wanted them to move a tiny bit, and next to one of the other soldiers, the soldier I was commanding would more often than not heal the nearby soldier without moving at all. In later levels where mortars can take out multiple soldiers in close proximity, it's can be very difficult to select the man you wish to revive. The mouse just didn't seem to do what I wanted it to do when the soldiers were bunched together, which only added to the above frustrations.

In summary, this game is seriously buggy. Due to the massive amount of bugs you will certainly encounter, this game is stripped from much of the fun that would normally have been enjoyed. Even if this game was bug-free, this would not have been an amazing game (it doesn't have multiplayer, there's not a lot of depth, the enemies are really stupid, you can easily miss shooting somebody standing right in front of you, etc.). Even on the GNU/Linux operating system, you could likely do better than ARMA Tactics for a turn-based game. eg. [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/237430]Expeditions: Conquistador[/url] looks like it could be good, and of course there's always [url=https://wesnoth.org/]The Battle for Wesnoth[/url].

The bottom line: Steer clear!

author: {'steamid': '76561197972086995', 'num_games_owned': 1977, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 698, 'last_played': 1400824375}
review: Real fun, easy to pick up if you aren't familiar with Turn Based Strategy games, slightly buggy but nothing major, but aren't most games buggy but we still enjoy them. overall 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021846141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1391724230}
review: Arma Tactics is a lackluster attempt at a TBS game. The view angles are horrible. The controls are unintuitive. The voice acting is absolutely horrendous. The graphics are acceptable until it zooms into the disorientating 3rd person when you move your guys. The line of sight of your units is ridiculous. You can shoot at enemies 100 feet away but an enemy at the ground floor right against the wall can fire to your guy on the roof. Thankfully I got this from a $1 Humble Bundle, otherwise I would have felt cheated. This is obviously from a know nothing developer or some interns which they slapped the Arma name onto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112344935', 'num_games_owned': 1103, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1391647412}
review: Got this with the Bohemia Bundle. ARMA 1-3 Are great games. OF:DR is an incredible game. Unfortunately this is even worse than OF:RR. An unoriginal concept  that was extremely poorly put together. You might say that I should give slack because it's a mobile game. There is one reason that I won't. People paid $10 for this game to play on PC. It should be up to the standards of any PC game (Risk of Rain, an amazing game, is up for the same price), regardless of the origin. It's like saying that an HD remake doesn't have to be in HD. It doesn't make sense to charge $10 for this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091809701', 'num_games_owned': 938, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 438, 'last_played': 1435338662}
review:
如果你是策略遊戲老手，這款可能無法滿足你的需求
但如果對只是剛接觸的新手(像我就是)，還算是有趣的小品

系統相當簡單好懂
每回合只有2個行動點數，可選擇 移動/攻擊/防禦/特殊行動

命中率是影響攻擊結果的最大因素，其他都不是重點
有時候明明距離只有1公尺還是會射不中，讓人火大XD

走位也相當重要，也最需要思考
受到視線影響，移動會有風險。時常走到一半才看到敵人，然後就被攻擊
不過敵人AI還蠻蠢的，只要不被正面看到或被攻擊，幾乎都只會呆在原地，像刺客教條那樣背刺也沒問題XD

至於武器種類則有點少，而且差異性不高，只要拿狙擊槍大概就贏了XD，射程最遠、命中又高

總之，本作優點就是系統簡單明瞭，但反過來說就是變化太少，耐玩度當然不如XCOM這種大作
如果地圖設計更多元化、武器選擇更多、行動模式變化增加、敵人種類變多，相信更值得一玩!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003878190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 833, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1433319032}
review:
-: bugy, kamera, UI, ovládanie, soundtrack, audio, cena, obmedzené taktické možnosti, strata času a peňazí, príbeh a jeho podanie, misie, žiadna zábava, atmosféra, padanie hry

+: menu, grafika, Steam achievementy, vylepšenia jednotky

Verdikt: Toto nie je Arma!!! Tento počin iba ničí meno tejto série. Obsahuje obrovské množstvo bugov, ktoré vo väčšine prípadov neumožňujú úspešné ukončiť misiu. Taktiež nemá nič spoločné s podtitulom Tactics. Autori by si mali najprv zahrať staručký Fallout Tactics, aby pochopili význam tohto slova. Najviac však človeka dokáže nahnevať bug-nutá exit zóna, do ktorej sa máte dostať po splnení cieľov misie. Jedinú misiu, ktorú môžete úspešne doviesť do konca, je ukončiť hru a vymazať ju z disku. To je rozkaz!!!

25%

author: {'steamid': '76561198042828673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1438854697}
review:
OKaay i will be straight forward. No unbalanced thoughts just straight forward. This game is just wayy to fun for me. The only doubts you will encounter is most of time the options are limited like the can't vault over walls and such and the animations aren't the best their just okay but it's because this was an android game too. Someparts are kind off annoying because sometimes they just miss all the time when shooting and or have weakshots, but thats why you gotta upgrade them. But all in forward this is a great casual game. I will spoil this for fun but the last mission in the first operation everyone is armed with the SVD Sniper rifle. So be prepared unlike me even though i did suceed unprepared.

EDIT
After coming back, i forgot that 85% of the time they miss with the 1 shot option, but have a greater chance when you use 2 AP points.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989764320', 'num_games_owned': 2833, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1561630896}
review:
"Let's make a mediocre turn-based tactics game and slap the ArmA brand on it!"
That's the game in a nutshell. It has nothing to do with ArmA and it doesn't even remotely offer the depth of an ArmA game.

The gameplay mechanics are pretty similiar to the new XCOM. Everyone of your soldiers has two actions per turn. You can move, shoot or use an item, reload your weapon, etc.. You can, of course, use both your actions to move further or take an aimed shot, too.
Just like XCOM, it also relies heavy on the use of cover and just like in XCOM there is also high and low cover, high cover of course providing more protection.
You also don't need to worry about ammo, as you have unlimited, but you need to reload, when you've emptied your weapons. 
Items like grenades or explosives have to be bought before a mission from the armory. You can also upgrade your weapons or buy new ones, but be aware that you can only use one weapon at a time. There are only four weapons, btw: an assault rifle, a LMG, a sniper rifle and a shotgun. There are also no sidearms. You do have a knife though, which you can use in close combat.
Your team always consists of the same four people. If anyone dies, it's game over and you can restart the mission. None of them is able to climb even the smallest obstacle. If you can't reach a place by walking, you won't get there. 
Oh, and if you decide to restart a mission, you lose the items you have used. Yes, whatever you have used, be it grenades, medkits or something else, are gone and you need to buy them again, which is utter stupid. If you restart a mission you should get the gear, with which you've started the mission, back.

Now let's talk about the AI, shall we? They are incredibly stupid. They love to run out of cover and right at you. Quite often they even shoot with their first action and THEN come closer to you. I've also witnessed them running into cover with their first action and with their second action they ran out of cover again...
Also more than once the AI wouldn't react to getting shot. They'd just stand there, doing nothing. They also seem to be deaf as they often don't react to gunshots, even if they should be in hearing range.

And the game seems to be quite buggy, too. On one mission I was teleported to the objective, while it was the enemy's turn, which pretty much broke the game, so I had to load the last save, which didn't help, because the game teleported me AGAIN. It did that also a third time, although that time it was actually my turn, which didn't help me much, because I was surrounded by enemies.
Another time I healed a character from across the level. And another time one of my grenades landed UNDER the floor, where it exploded and did nothing. And while we're at grenades: it seems sometimes you can't throw them over cover for no apparent reason.

I'm not going much into the graphics, as the game is a mobile port, but it looks bad. It's pretty much the same with the sound design. The voice acting is pretty bad and the subtitles often don't match what they're actually saying.
The camera is also quite bad.

All in all, this is a really bad game. If you really want a TBT game, you're MUCH better off with XCOM. And if you want the, imo, best in the genre, get Jagged Alliance 2. Combined with patch 1.13 this is by far the best TBT game you can get, even though it doesn't look like much nowadays.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072923509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1525778795}
review: I have played the game for several hours now and have enjoyed on the most part such as the tactical play and the squad leveling system i find to be quite amusing and fun the campaign levels are a challenge and you have to play tactically to achieve success this challenge is great but to my sad regret i do not recomment purchasing because this game constantly crashes during play and needs fixing for example if you start a random mission like a terrorist hunt you will get half way through and the game saves the crashes and when you resume the game to the times it crashes becomes more frequently and commonly the developer has put no effort to fix these crashes yet but until they do this game i do not recommend purchasing unless on sale but the gameplay for people who enjoy a casual turn based stratergy game this game will occupy you for hours and it is fun i would rate the game 7/10 if it didnt have the constant frustrating crashes during the game which amost makes it unbearable and eventually give up playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046233058', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1390784877}
review: There's nothing tactical about Arma Tactics for the PC. You'll initially spend hours guiding your squad through the streets of war-torn Africa. In the beginning, you'll enjoy sprinting past the unintelligent AI. However, there's nothing more annoying than taking time to position your sqaud in a defensive position, only to have one of them killed because the AI can shoot through walls. Compounded by an awful storyline, poor voice acting, and terrible graphics, Arma Tactics is practically unplayable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027876618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1390548684}
review:
This game is an abortion to gameplay. A demonic full of bugs thing that cannot be called software. Idiotic voices, boring ambience (is there any?), stupid AI, and 0 intuitive.

You can't get a clue if your distance to an enemy is enough or not to be seen. Friendlies can spot enemies from a mile long. Is that behaviour equal to enemies AI? You never know. This is a funny fact: A guy in house roof can spot you INSIDE THAT house (bionic vision). That's nothing comparing to the fact that they can hit you indeed.

A friendly kill gives experience to the wrong guy. Enemies giving you their back can spot you. But, not always...

This ... how should I call it? this intention of algorithms trying to produce an entertainment is a complete fail.

To remain clear: boring, full of bugs, poor sound, horrible AI, stupid voice acting, NO AMBIENCE AT ALL.

Don't you ever think of buying this ... whatever.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997887823', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1434060780}
review:
Me sorprendió bastante la primera vez que supe de la existencia de este juego. Qué curioso, un Arma enfocado al género de estrategia de escuadrones por turnos... ¡Con lo que a mí me gusta la saga de los Arma en general y los Laser Squad! ¡Seguro que este también me va a gustar! Craso error.

Defino el juego por encima: Se trata de algo que poco tiene que ver con el enfoque del universo de los Arma y que como juego de estrategia por turnos deja mucho que desear. Pocas armas, mecánicas escasas y repetitivas, puntos de objetivo apenas reconocibles (y absurda la manera de alcanzarlos con todo el escuadrón), se centra exclusivamente en la infantería con todo el juego que podrían aprovechar de recursos tierra, mar y aire... Muchas de las probabilidades de ataques son surrealistas (ese 2% de fallar una cuchillada a medio metro en qué coño estaba pensando el que lo programaba??).

La historia parece que la ha pensado un niño de 5 años. Llena de topicazos de los que huían los otros Armas, dignos de un Call of Duty. Incongruencias por todos lados como la de "ups, esto es una misión de sigilo y nos hemos dejado los silenciadores, ay que cabeza la nuestra jijiji"... Ni siquiera nos dejan claro cómo empieza o cómo acaba. Típicos protagonistas de superhéroes americanos con el "no queremos el reconocimiento, somos así de bohemios" entre ceja y ceja.

El tema de los glitchs, bugs y fallos tampoco pasa desapercibido. Ni siquiera he podido pasarme la segunda campaña por culpa de un fallo en el que no se veía en el mapa por donde tenía que escapar. Animaciones ragdoll estropeadas, ítems sin descripción... ¡Y dando gracias de que el juego no crashea, con el escaso apartado gráfico que tiene para ser un Arma de 2013! ¿Por qué dejarán que se publiquen estos juegos a medio hacer en Steam?

Tenian un amplísimo margen para que este juego fuese bueno. No se han esmerado ni la mitad de la mitad de la mitad de lo que se han podido esmerar en crear los demás juegos de la saga. Esto no merece llamarse Arma, y mucho menos Tactics.

3.5/10 Un concepto mal llevado a la práctica.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011403266', 'num_games_owned': 1376, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1515275950}
review:
I am a big fan of tactical rpgs and took a particular liking to X-Com, so I thought this might be cool as well.  It really didn't bring any depth to combat that I could find.  To make matters worse, it had a terrible user interface.  Camera angles made it hard to even move around the map.  Several times I tried to sneak attack an enemy but the game insisted on moving me right in front of them instead.  Movement for a single AP (which would allow you to still attack on your turn) was painfully short, so I spent most of the time sprinting and just dealing with enemies when they showed up.

Overall, I didn't find much to make this game worth playing.  Just play through X-Com again if you really need to scratch that itch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014735100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1389939767}
review:
買わない方がいいレベル。私の環境ではバグなのかは分からないが、チュートリアルにて仲間を手当するコマンドが出ないのでそれ以上進めない。
そして、ゲーム的にチュートリアルを終わらせないと何も出来ないように他の項目がロックされてるので完全に詰んだ。
私は他サイトのバンドルで入手したのでまだいいが、フルプライスもしくはそれに近い値段で購入は絶対にするべきではない。
$2もしくは$1以下じゃないと絶対に損する。

author: {'steamid': '76561198022198593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1506634839}
review:
ARMAのターン制シュミレーションゲームと聞いて期待していましたがルートが一本道に近く、動かしてみてユニットの反応やそもそもの操作方法などがイマイチでした。
できることや索敵方法なども従来のゲームと大差なくどちらかというと他作よりも劣っていると感じました。

これ買うくらいならなにか他のものを探したほうがいいかもしれません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198051995015', 'num_games_owned': 1741, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1444309957}

author: {'steamid': '76561197980514994', 'num_games_owned': 801, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1389956146}
review:
Not as bad as people say but still not worthy of a recommendation. Game works well but the mechanics make it too unrealistic. To enjoy this game you will need to be able to look past the fact that a fully trained soldier, in this game, can miss the enemy standing at almost point blank range. Also hiding behind cover doesn't always work.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198010175072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1390250250}
review: My soldiers, well hidden behind walls, get shot by Taliban with AK's four times out of five. My soldiers, with M4's, manage to miss Taliban, out in the open, five times in a row. Quite frustrating... I don't know if the chances-calculator is fucked up or what, but that's just plain frustrating and ruins the game for me...

author: {'steamid': '76561198058093092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1389901671}
review:
Not well optimized (panning, zooming, scrolling etc all stutter and lag), mobile/touch interfaced that wasn't overhauled for PC, poor controls and combat lacking depth.

I played this on Android and it was decent enough, but just the bad optimization of the game is hindering me from playing any further. Compared to XCOM, this has almost zero depth, but the actual gameplay itself to me is fine (if you're not overly nitpicky). It is a good starting point for people new to tactical squad-based TBS games. 

Alas, this is an uninspired PC port of a decent Android game. Thankfully I got it for only $1 in the Humble Bundle.

review: Dieses Spiel ist reine Zeitverschwendung und total beschissen! Es ist eine Beleidigung für jeden der bei Verstand ist. Darüber zu sprechen und zu schreiben ist eine Qual. Also gute Nacht!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994910887', 'num_games_owned': 1111, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1391016601}
review:
Turn-based squad strategy.

This game suprised me. Its compareable to XCOM: Enemy Unknown, or Jagged Alliance in terms of mechanics.
While its not offering that much variety its still good for about 10 hours of gameplay, and those are very solid. However there are some bugs, the action cam bugged out for me way to often, so i disabled it, which fixed the problems mostly. But be warned, some enemies can see through roofs and shoot through them...
A few more different weapons would have been nice, but the way it is you have clearly defined purposes without to much complexity.
Its absolutly worth 5$ they want at time of this review, a clear recommendation.
'nuff said.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057206182', 'num_games_owned': 265, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1465484224}
review: Don't waste your money on this. I bought it via humble bundle and it's still not worth it. The game is shallow and dumb. It's basically just mindless clicking, just like playing solitaire but with a clunkier interface. It's a very, very dumbed down and "tactical"-level only version of the latest X-COM, which is already bad itself if you like good and proper turn-based games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040811698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 426, 'playtime_forever': 831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 732, 'last_played': 1434238266}
review: I would recommend this game to people who enjoy tactics games, it has some cool features like customizing your soldiers skills through XP and purchasing new items and weapons with cash in between missions. Also in addition to the campaign you can generate some random missions too to get some extra XP or cash to 'level up' your soldiers. There are some frustrating aspects, like the camera you can rotate and zoom but can't tilt or go top-down. Even though it is a tactics game, there is no grid so movement is a bit less precise. Also you can't name or change the appearance of your soldiers, and you always have the same team of 4. I'd suggest XCOM before this, but it's still a game worth having for tactics fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066188840', 'num_games_owned': 1184, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1435811797}
review: Piece of shit, do not even think about buying, limited by mobile because it was developed as a mobile fucking game ported to PC for no reason, its such a piece of shit in every aspect, its like XCOM with soldiers only worse in every single aspect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019310678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1389990282}
review: this game feels somewhat like a school project, it is not even near to being a finished product. the game mechanics are lousy, the graphics are bad, gameplay is overall not fun in any way. i've this game after playing xcom enemies, which is basically very similar, only xcom is acctually good. this is not. really really not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040291773', 'num_games_owned': 350, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1390334791}
review:
Game has been patched so its less buggy now. Quite a fun statergy game. Decent port from the Android version. Lacks multiplayer but is still an enjoyable experience. It has a progression system in the way of different levels to overcome, a shop where you can spend exp to buy upgrades for your weapons or you can spend your exp on your characters and upgrade their base stats. 

Overall a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068900012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1389999043}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024440612', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1380755171}
review: Gameplay is rather neat, but I wouldn't call it "Arma" per say. Arma allows you to drive and fly, where this is only foot based and even then Arma foot base is not great. For a tactical game, it has its up's and downs, but I would recommend it for people looking for a tactical based game and don't know about Arma.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982641475', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1389906771}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025548987', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1463426781}

author: {'steamid': '76561198084500618', 'num_games_owned': 1673, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1639047329}
review: С чего бы начать... Было у отца три сына - XCOM умный был детина, Omerta был и так и сяк, а Arma Tactics инвалид. Вроде бы, задумка хорошая, идея с покупкой снаряжения тоже ничего, но реализовано всё это так тускло, так не энергично, что порой застрелиться хочется. В игре просидел онлайн 1 час, остальное время играю в неё, когда интернета нет. Сама по себе, Arma Tactics не особо затягивает - вялые перестрелки, типичная история, а что ещё хуже - ну оооочень тупые враги. Всё равно что с детьми воевать. Сразу видно - игрушка создана под планшетники, для ПК её можно расценивать, как мини-игру, которая косит под полноценную пошаговую стратегию. Как бы её не хаяли, какой бы медленной и скучной не была Arma Tactics, но скоротать время за ней вы сможете и довольно таки неплохо. Тратить 300 рублей не вижу смысла, поэтому лучше подождать скидок и купить её рублей за 60.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043730485', 'num_games_owned': 862, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1595546109}

author: {'steamid': '76561198034340520', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1381309637}
review: Have you ever entered a game for the first time and started the tutorial and no more than 10 minutes into it you just couldn't stomach another second of it? Have you ever thought a game was so bad inside of ten minutes that you were going to Puke if you forced another second into it? Well this would be that game folks. TERRIBLE in a word. Clunky user interface combined with broken aspects (soldiers shooting each other w/o line of sight) I mean just plain TERRIBLE!! For those of you who need more explanation ... please ... waste your money on this stinker and play it ... it wont take long to convince you much better than I ever could.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961812140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1404600505}
